Pozíció leírása / Job description
Do you have good analytical skills and a result-oriented mindset? Are you ready to kickstart your career in a multilingual environment where you can use your language skills on a daily basis? Would you like to work for one of the largest providers of information technology, consulting services and business process outsourcing? If your answer is YES, perfect!  
Join one of the worlds biggest multinational companies in Budapest as a Service Desk Analyst! 
We are looking for fresh grads with strong language knowledge or candidates with 1-3 years of experience!
As a Service Desk Analyst (Level 1) you will resolve IT issues for our multinational customers together with your colleagues in an international team.
They will contact you via email, phone, chat or a self-service portal and your task will be to support them  by resolving the issue on the spot or by coordinating with other technician teams (Level 2) to find the resolution.
Besides IT troubleshooting, your responsibilities will include administration and translation of these incoming requests, providing information to both customers and IT teams and follow-up on unresolved cases to make sure that the teams targets are met.
                Elvárások / Requirements
You are the perfect candidate if you:
have confident level of English knowledge and fluent level of German/French/Italian/Dutch/Polish
feel enthusiastic about answering questions and providing support to international partner
Advantages:
Customer Service / Service Desk / IT support experience
Knowledge of computer hardware/peripherals and printers
Any previous experience or studies related to Windows operating system, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Outlook and other standard software
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
We offer a colourful and dynamic work environment with:
a great diversity of nationalities, cultures and business areas: almost 50% of our team is international; your colleagues are from 80 countries.
Language courses: You will have the opportunity to learn new languages or improve existing language skills. Enrol for our free language courses provided by accredited language school and practice your freshly gained knowledge on a daily basis with your team.
Training: Are you concerned about your IT skills? Are you a comfortable home user of todays technologies and have interest and affinity to learn more about IT? We are ready to provide the technical and soft skill training necessary to be successful in your position. In addition, you will have access to various well-known online learning platforms.
Internal rotations in-between professional areas and promotions: As the company is growing continuously, you will have an opportunity to choose your own career path. Our team will support your aspiration in your future personal and professional development.
Volunteering, sport and employee events: You will be part of a great community where you can engage in various sports, social responsibility activities, student or employee events while making nice memories with your teammates.
Multilingual Service Desk Analyst

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
At our Client they are on a mission to modernize voice with trust, identity, and intelligence. They are protecting everyday people from spam and fraud calls, connecting businesses with their customers, and helping carriers secure their networks for all. In 2015, the Company founder saw the increasing need for innovation in the voice channel and began building the first caller ID and spam blocking apps for mobile while at Whitepages. In early 2016, the Company spun out of Whitepages and brought its technology to market through Samsung Smart Call, the first-ever network-based spam solution with AT&T, and the our Client's consumer app. Three years later in 2019, they brought our Client connect to market, a B2B branded call service that enables enterprise companies to connect to the consumers they are trying to reach. The combination of Protect, Connect, and the app has resulted in the world's largest Voice Performance Platform with over 200M monthly active users.
About the Position
The Backend Engineer is an Individual contributor position responsible for designing, coding and operating high performance data processing systems and backend services for their customer facing web services on the JVM platform (primarily Scala). Our ideal candidate would have the skills and desire to understand their entire stack, from their cloud platform (AWS) through data storage technologies (such as DynamoDB, Redshift) and stream processing (Kafka) all the way to Scala/akka based services.
About the Team
Our Client's Protect team has built a leading fraud detection system for phone calls used by millions of users around the Globe through mobile and network integrations. Their mission is to eliminate unwanted calls and bring trust and intelligence back to the phone calls by using modern technologies and machine learning. Their innovative platform is able to process hundreds of thousands requests and runs half million models per second.
What You’ll Do
Work at a supportive and fast-growing startup with a fantastic team.
Build and operate world class services in the field of phone fraud detection
Make an impact in the lives of tens of millions of consumers on a daily basis
Collaborate and learn from other great team members.
Support in developing your skills and accelerating your career
                Elvárások / Requirements
Experience or interest in functional programming in a typed setting; 
A philosophy of iteration and continuous improvement;
Experience building highly scalable and -available production services;
BSc or M.S in a relevant field; 2+ years relevant work experience;
Excellent communication and self-organization skills incl. working within and with other remote teams;
Familiar with data storage- and processing systems (such as Postresql, Amazon DynamoDB, Amazon Redshift, Apache Spark, ElasticSearch, Redis);
Experience with *nix.
Proficient at collaborating and communicating with both local and remote team members in English and Hungarian
You will have a fast start if you have experience with:
Scala
Cloud environments (AWS)
Big-data technologies and platforms (Spark, Athena/Presto, Zeppelin, Databricks)
Modern deployment environments (Kubernetes, Docker)
High performance HTTP API
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Private Retirement/Pension program 
Medicover
Commuter benefit, parking facility, bike storage
Donation Matching for a charity of your choice (up to $500/ year)
WFH equipment stipend 
$1,000/year in Professional Development funds
Online English Classes
Gym membership
Full-flex working model (You decide whether you are working from home or from the office.)
Backend Engineer (Scala) - protect team

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. We are looking for a Lead developer to be part of their team. 
Your Tasks will be:
Responsibility for the architecture and interface design, requirements analysis and subsequent implementation for an end-to-end IoT cloud;Responsibility for conceptual tasks in backend development with high demands on data security and data protection;Proactive source of ideas for new technologies, systems, processes and optimizations;Analysis, conception, implementation and testing of new customer-specific applications and modules.Support for the requirements survey, presentation of the results to the customer and technical and technological advice;Coaching and technical management of 10 developers in the team;The applications that you are responsible for implementing are based on Java, JavaScript, Python and Go. Other programming languages can also be integrated. The deployment infrastructure is in the cloud.
                Elvárások / Requirements
Successfully completed studies in the field of (business) computer science, business (engineering) or a comparable subject;Very experienced in developing IT architectures;Several years of professional experience in the field of software development / full stack, cloud, microservices and knowledge of infrastructure and operationsSystematic application of methods for requirements analysis and agile software development (Scrum, Kanban, UX) as well as systematic application of standards in IT service management (IT-PEP, ITIL, DevOps);Technology stack: extensive knowledge of Java and JavaScript, Docker, MS Azure and databases including graph databases;Fluency in written and spoken English
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Stable company background and long-term working possibility;Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company;Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries;Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses;Competitive salary and performance-related bonus;Cafeteria with optional elements;Home office work;School start support
Lead Developer IoT Cloud

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Provide core customer service support for assigned applications and systems
Initiate process changes and improvements that increase operating efficiency based on the Lean methodology
Complete moderately complex projects end-to-end, utilizing tools and methodologies
Provide guidance regarding Information Security concepts and policies (IS/GIDA policies and guidelines), recommend and implement day-to-day work
Identify, register and resolve potential compliance issues, including accurate closure and inventory tracking
Understand and apply complex decision-making processes by seeking out input from stakeholders and comprehending risks in decision making
Communicate the need for change, involve stakeholders in the change process and apply change theory to complete successful adoption
Coach team member, identify development needs and identify resources to recommend stretch capabilities
Appropriately assess risk when business decisions are made, demonstrating particular consideration for the firm's reputation and safeguarding the company, its clients and assets, by driving compliance with applicable laws, rules and regulations, adhering to Policy, applying sound ethical judgment regarding personal behavior, conduct and business practices, and escalating, managing and reporting control issues with transparency.

2-3 years of relevant experience (project management, project coordination - no PMI certificate needed)
Fluent in English
Certifications preferred

 DevOps Engineer - Windows 
 Budapest  
ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Cloud DevOps Engineer
Corporate on-prem és cloud architektúrában teljes end-to-end megoldások konfigurálása, karbantartása, monitorozása,
Clusterzett, redundáns, skálázható megoldásokkal,
Dockerizált, Kubernetes vagy Docker Swarm által orchestrált clusterek felügyelete és továbbfejlesztése, melyek horizontálisan/vertikálisan skálázható microserviceeket tartalmaznak,
Kiemelten fontos, hogy nem csak karbantartás, hanem a meglévő ökoszisztéma folyamatos fejlesztése, valós devops feladatok, melyet gondos tervezés és validálás előz meg,
Nagy volumenű és a piackritikus valós adatok kezelése, amelyekkel az ipari szegmens vezető szereplőit támogatja a felügyelt rendszer,
A metrikák folyamatos kiértékelése és ezek alapján optimalizációs lépések, továbbfejlesztések, javaslatok kidolgozása a megrendelő felé,
Az ökoszisztéma cloud részén nyújtott natív szolgáltatások folyamatos analizálása és ajánlattétel, ha bizonyos szolgáltatással ki lehet váltani meglévő klasszikus megoldást,
Corporate network szegmensek becsatolásának, integrálásának biztosítása a saját ökoszisztémába.
                Elvárások / Requirements
Angol tárgyalóképes nyelvismeret,
Nemzetközi projekt tapasztalat,
Docker, Docker Swarm és Kubernetes ismerete,
Fenti clusterezési és orchestrációs megoldások tooling utility-jeinek ismerete,
Konténerizált, virtualizált, orkesztrált microservice alapú technológiákban szerzett DevOps szakmai tapasztalat (AKS, Docker Swarm, Docker, Helm, Terraform, Azure Service),
JIRA, Bitbucket, Confluence vagy hasonló kollaborációs rendszerek ismerete,
Scrumban való jártasság,
Azure, Amazon vagy Google Cloud platform szolgáltatások ismerete,
ITIL ismeret.
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Folyamatosan fejlődő és növekvő vállalati háttér,
Családias hangulat,
Támogató közeg,
Nemzetközi projektekben részvétel,
Hibrid munkavégzési lehetőség (Irodai, home office munkavégzés),
Versenyképes bérezés és juttatási csomag.

PLC technikus 
Nemzetközi gyártótevékenységet végző vállalatnál szeretnél tapasztalatot szerezni vagy kamatoztatni?
30 éves múltra visszatekintő, autóipari beszállító cég keres PLC technikus munkatársat. Amennyiben motivált vagy az alább szereplő feladatok elvégzésére, angolul is boldogulsz és vonz az autóipar világa, akkor várjuk jelentkezésed az oldal alján!
Ne habozz!

5S szabályai alapján a gyártómunka elvégzése
Karbantartási feladatok ellátása (pl. csavarozás)
Műszaki magasszintű működés biztosítása (gépek, berendezések)
Karbantartók támogatása elektromos rajzok és előírások tekintetében
Feljegyzések készítése a javításokról
Hatékonyság növelése folyamatfejlesztéssel

Minimum technikusi végzettség

Műszaki supportos IT rendszergazda 
munkatársat keresünk
A Mohanet Mobilsystems Zrt, a magyarországi M2M szektor meghatározó fejlesztő és szolgáltató vállalata műszaki supportos IT rendszergazda munkatársat keres az általa gyártott távfelügyeleti rendszerek hardverek és szoftverek műszaki támogatásához.
Elvárások:
Műszaki végzettség
LINUX alapú szerverek üzemeltetői szintű ismerete
Adatbázis kiszolgálók felépítésének és működösének általános ismerete
Hálózati, rendszergazdai ismeretek
Önállóság
Pontos, precíz, gyors munkavégzés
Előnyt jelent:
Felsőfokú műszaki végzettség
Min. 2 év, hasonló munkakörben tapasztalat
Alapfokú angol nyelvismeret
Feladatok:
Műszaki support tevékenység ellátása a vállalat partnerei számára munkaidőben és ügyeleti jelleggel.
Üzemeltetői szintű kapcsolattartás a vállalat belső és külső fejlesztőivel.
Fejlesztésekkel kapcsolatos ügyféligények összegyűjtése és továbbítása.
Új termékek, szoftver bevezetésénél, a termék tesztelése és értékelése a minőség ellenőrzési vezető jelzései alapján.
Telepítési és kezelési utasítások megírása.
Új partnerek szervereinek beszerzése, saját telephelyen történő telepítése, tesztelése.
A vállalat belső rendszergazdai feladatainak ellátása. Kapcsolattartás a külsős rendszergazdával.

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Ügyfelünk egy rendezvény-technika területén nemzetközi szinten elismert magyar vállalat, akiknek a budapesti központjukba keressük egyik termékük Product Owner-ét.
TE VAGY AZ IDEÁLIS JELÖLT SZÁMUNKRA, HA:
fontos számodra, hogy képviselheted a felhasználót, ismered a fejlesztések üzleti követel-ményeit, a megrendelők igényeit;
képes vagy termékben gondolkodni és aktívan tudod támogatni a product manager kollégákat a termékvízió megalkotásában, inputokkal, észrevételekkel, ötletekkel,
a hosszabb távú víziót önállóan tudod kisebb, a csapatod scope-jába illeszkedő, a felhasználó számára is értelmezhető értéket képviselő szállítandókra bontani,
erősséged, hogy átlátod az üzleti célokat, meg tudod állapítani a termékkel szemben megfo-galmazott elvárások fontossági sorrendjét, így folyamatosan képes vagy priorizálni a backlog elemeit,
product owner-ként képes vagy motiválni és segíteni a csapatodat abban, hogy iterációról iterációra a maximális értéket állítsák elő,
a megértett felhasználói igényeket kiválóan le tudod fordítani a fejlesztők nyelvére, így bizto-sítod, hogy a csapat megértse a követelményeket,
tárgyilagosan tudsz döntéseket hozni a szállítás eredményeinek elfogadásáról,
megvannak a technológiai alapjaid ahhoz, hogy a system architect csapat által felvázolt technológiai elvárásokat megértsd, és szakmai vonatkozásában képviseld a csapatod előtt,
a csapat hatáskörébe tartozó technológiai, szakmai irányokat önállóan is meg tudod határoz-ni, azok leszállítását képes vagy lekövetni,
ismerősek számodra a szoftverfejlesztés eszközei, módszerei, technológiai megoldásai és korlátai;
dolgoztál már valamilyen skálázott agilis vállalati keretrendszerben (pl. SAFe),
motivál, hogy tapasztalatoddal segítheted a leendő csapatodat az érett agilis csapattá válásban, a folyamatos fejlődésben,
szívesen képviseled a termékkörödet és a csapatodat a szervezetben, a közös szervezeti agilis eseményeken,
nyitott vagy az új ötletekre és azokat másokkal közösen szereted megvalósítani, fontos számodra, hogy együtt, egymást tisztelve és segítve tudjunk kiváló minőségű termékeket fejleszteni.
                Elvárások / Requirements
EHHEZ MINDENKÉPP SZÜKSÉGES, HOGY LEGYEN:
felsőfokú műszaki vagy gazdasági végzettséged;
legalább 3 év scrum csapatban, Product Owner szerepkörben szerzett gyakorlatod;
tapasztalatod szoftverfejlesztési folyamatok működésében,
tapasztalatod változásmenedzsmentben;
kiváló kommunikációs készséged az információk professzionális formában történő átadásá-hoz;
csapatjátékos beállítottságod és alkalmazkodó készséged;
szisztematikus munkavégzésed, rendszerszemléleted és analitikus képességed;
szakmai angol nyelvismereted.
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
AMIT MI TUDUNK BIZTOSÍTANI, HOGY JÓL ÉREZD MAGAD NÁLUNK:
versenyképes jövedelmet és többféle egyéb juttatás; 
fél év betanulás után heti 2 nap home office lehetőség;
részese lehetsz egy magyar cég sikerének a világpiacon;
dinamikusan fejlődő és stabil háttér;
jó hangulatú, fiatalos légkör;
emberközpontú szemlélet;
meghallgatjuk az ötleteidet;
belvárosi, jól megközelíthető iroda;
magas színvonalú csapatépítő tréningeket és egyéb közösségépítő programok.

További állások
INFORMATIKUS 
Megbízóm a légszűrés-technika piacvezető szakértőjeként, világszínvonalú termékeket szállít autóipari, gyógyszeripari és tisztatéri légtisztítási megoldásokhoz.
	A cég alapelvei a csapatszellem, a nyílt kommunikáció, és a folyamatos fejlődés.
Telephelyük bővítése kapcsán keresik IT... 
Elvárások: Elvárások:
Informatikai felsőfokú végzettség
2-5 év releváns munkatapasztalat informatikai nemzetközi környezetben, ipari vállalatokban vagy gyártó vállalkozásokban
Releváns kompetencia az ERP rendszerekben (SAP, MS Dynamics NAV)
Magas szintű kompetencia az SQL programozásban
Az informatikai folyamatok, köztük a szoftver / hardver alkalmazások alapos ismerete
Problémamegoldó készség, több feladat / projekt kezelésének képessége, megfelelő prioritások meghatározása
Képesség az ismeretek és készségek átadására a különböző szintű és kompetenciájú más felhasználók számára
Hatékony kommunikáció képessége minden szinten
Jó magyar és angol kommunikációs készség (írásban és szóban)
Önálló munkavégzés, nemzetközi csapattal való együttműködési hajlandóság
Amit nyújtunk: 
Multinacionális környezet fejlődési/képzési lehetőségekkel
Versenyképes jövedelem+ Cafeteria+ Bónusz+bejárási költségtérítés
Hosszútávú munkalehetőség, egy dinamikusan fejlődő csapat tagjaként
Tervezhető, kiszámítható munkaidő, céges rendezvények, gyümölcsnapok
Elmentem az állást

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Karbantartó mérnök 
Karbantartó mérnök
Feladatok:
Termék-gyártáshoz szükséges gépek, berendezések, eszközök rendelkezésre állásásnak biztosítása
Gépek hatékonyságára, állásidőkre, hibaokokra vonatkozó elemzések készítése
Karbantartási költségek csökkentését szolgáló fejlesztések megvalósítása
Gyártósorokon végzendő műszaki változtatások elvégezésének felügyelete, a berendezések fejlesztése, a berendezések karbantarthatóságának javítása
Részvétel a gépbeszerzési és üzembe helyezési projektekben
Megelőző karbantartások tervezése, előkészítése, és ellenőrzése
Épület üzemeltetéshez kapcsolódó karbantartások elvégzése
Részvétel a folyamatos fejlesztési projektekben (TPM, 5S, SMED, 8D, Kaizen)
Tartalék alkatrész felhasználás tervezése, kontrollálása, optimalizálása
Dokumentáció kezelés, karbantartó szoftver működtetése és napra készen tartása
Karbantartáshoz és üzemeltetéshez tartozó teljesítménymutatók menedzselése
Energia megtakarítási projektek vezetése
Műszaki beruházások támogatása épületgépészeti szempontból
Karbantartó kollégák folyamatos szakmai támogatása, oktatása
Új belépő karbantartók és operátorok oktatása
Elvárások:
Gépész, mechatronikai vagy villamos mérnöki diploma
2-3 éves releváns tapasztalat gyártógépek karbantartásában – nyomdai tapasztalat előny
TPM gyakorlati ismerete
Angol nyelv társalgási szintű ismerete
MS Office felhasználói szintű ismerete
AutoCAD, PLC ismeretek
Lean ismeretek
Amit mi kínálunk:
Változatos gyártási technológiák megismerése: a hagyományos nyomdagépektől egészen a legmodernebb digitális nyomtató és vágógépekig.
Fejlődési lehetőség, technikai ismeretek folyamatos bővítésére.
Változatos feladatok, új kihívások.
Jól felszerelt, új, modern munkakörnyezet.
Fiatalos csapat
Megbecsülés és biztonság.
A jelentkezéseket a "Jelentkezem" gombra kattintva várjuk.
ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Senior Azure Cloud Architect 
Country: Hungary (+36) • Budapest
Description:
We are looking for a Senior Azure Cloude Architect for a new venture of one of the region's most established multinational company.
Duties:
• Lead the foundation of the Cloud Architecture & Governance for the SME Corporation
• Support the Azure DataPlatform Architecture design
• Support the Azure DevOps Architecture design
• Support the Azure RunTime Infrastructure design for the core business enabler Marketplace Platform in Azure Kubernetes Services and other native Azure Cloud Services
• Support the Azure EventHub/DataServices Integration Architecture design
• Design and Prepare the Policy Environment within Azure Cloud
• Support the Azure RunTime Infrastructure design for the core business enabler Marketplace Platform in Azure Kubernetes Services and other native Azure Cloud Services
• Support integration initiatives and related Solution Architecture in/outbound from Azure Cloud
• Support SaaS ICT Architecture and Implementation in Azure
• Design and Prepare the Policy Environment within Azure Cloud
• Support integration initiatives and related Solution Architecture in/outbound from Azure Cloud
• Work together with the Chief Security Architect / Virtual CISO on Cloud Security Topics
• Support implementation of mitigations per the Business Continuity Plan
• Support the preparation of an IT Policy for the Enterprise
Requirements and skills:
• Experience in setting up and operating an Azure Cloud environment for a SME
• Expert within Azure IaaS, SaaS Cloud Services and Architecture
• Experience with Azure Networking services, Azure Security and Identity services, Azure Integration services, Azure SQL Database, SQL Server, SQL Server IaaS, firewalls, Web App proxies, Bash, BGP, Chef, Puppet, PowerShell scripting, Azure Monitor and Application Insights
• Experience with configuring, deploying and operating public cloud services (e.g. Azure, AWS, GCP)
• Expertise in infrastructure as code (e.g., cloud formation, ARM, Terraform, Ansible, Chef, Puppet)
• Basic familiarity with network features • e.g. cloud network topology, BGP, routing, web (REST) APIs
• Experience with configuring, deploying and operating public cloud services (e.g. Azure, AWS, GCP)
• Awareness in open source tools & scripting language (e.g. Python, powershell, Shell)
• Deep understanding of software development lifecycles and cloud economics, incl. knowledge of consumption-driven TCO
• Expertise in infrastructure as code (e.g., cloud formation, ARM, Terraform, Ansible, Chef, Puppet)
• High availability engineering experience (region, availability zone, data replication clustering)
• Good knowledge of security implications of public & private cloud infra design
• Experience with Cloud Automation and Infrastructure as Code
• Microsoft Certified Azure Architect is a plus
Command of languages:
Good command of English
Client company profile:
Our client company is a new venture for one of the region's most established multinational company. Strong backing and commitment from the Shareholders
What they offer:
• Competitive Compensation Package and Incentive System (13th and 14th Month salary bonus + Annual financial bonus based on company goals)
• 3 days home office/week, flexible working hours
• Less Regulation, Fast Moving Agile Organization
• State of the Art Technologies and Capabilities relying on in-house developed Products and 3rd Party Cloud SaaS / PaaS
• Lots of room for career growth
• Efficient Business Operations, lean Processes and low level of Bureaucracy
• Regional ambition, potential international expansion ahead
Further information:
By submitting an application form or sending your curriculum vitae electronically, you will be giving the employees of PBS International Ltd. the approval and acknowledgement to access, handle and record the personal details you have submitted for application and registration processing. During the course of your application and in the future event that a prospective party expresses professional interest in you, we will only forward your details onto our clients upon your exclusive and prior approval. • Experience with Mulesoft, Azure EventHub, Azure ServiceBus is a plus

Senior Quality Assurance Lead 
Country: Hungary (+36) • Budapest
Description:
We are looking for a Senior Quality Assurance Lead for a new venture of one of the region's most established multinational company.
Duties:
• Lead the Functional and Non-Functional Assessment and Acceptance of a Custom Built Marketplace Platform by a 3rd Party Vendor
• Define the verification strategy, approach, methods and timeline for the Acceptance of the Marketplace Platform
• Ensure appropriate Performance, Break, Stress, Load Testing takes place to verify the Platform's scalability qualities and fitness to serve the Business (we expect 150 transactions / second, 150 000 concurrent users, 300 000 process instances / day)
• Oversee the 3rd Party Penetration & Vulnerability Testing and Security Assessment
• Prepare and Manage the Functional Testing, including the UAT with the Client, Customer Focus Group, Partner Focus Group
• Prepare Test Strategy, Test Scripts, Test Scenarios, Test Reports as part of the functional and non-functional testing
• Verify the Test Automation (Automatic Regression Test Suite), Virtualization capabilities provided by the Application Delivery Vendor
• Carry out occasional ad-hoc manual Testing activities
• Design the Test Automation Architecture and underlying Infrastructure (integrated with the DevOps Architecture and Infrastructure) for the Corporation
• Bring in Test Driven Development methodologies, principles, know-how and evangelize the benefits and value proposition
Requirements and skills:
Experience acting as an overall Quality Manager for large scale Projects, Delivery Streams managing all aspects of Testing, Test Scripts, Test Cases
• Identifies and analyzes issues, bugs, defects, and other problems, particularly when problems recur in multiple products; recommends and facilitates solutions to these issues
• Set and Guard Quality Gates, Controls within the Product Delivery Streams
• Maintains compliance with federal, state, local, and organizational laws, regulations, guidelines, and policies
• Hands on knowledge with Test Management, Test Automation, Test Virtualization Tools & Techniques
• Continuous process improvement (Lean, Six Sigma)
• Experience with Test / Behavior Driven Development is a plus Experience with Performance, Load, Stress and Break testing is a plus
Command of languages:
Good command of English
Client company profile:
Our client company is a new venture for one of the region's most established multinational company. Strong backing and commitment from the Shareholders
What they offer:
• Competitive Compensation Package and Incentive System (13th and 14th Month salary bonus + Annual financial bonus based on company goals)
• 3 days home office/week, flexible working hours
• Less Regulation, Fast Moving Agile Organization
• State of the Art Technologies and Capabilities relying on in-house developed Products and 3rd Party Cloud SaaS / PaaS
• Lots of room for career growth
• Efficient Business Operations, lean Processes and low level of Bureaucracy
• Regional ambition, potential international expansion ahead

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Senior Security Architect 
Country: Hungary (+36) • Budapest
Description:
We are looking for a Senior Security Architect for a new venture of one of the region's most established multinational company.
Duties:
•- Prepare SOC Solution Implementation, as much as possible and resonable on Azure / Microsoft products
•- Prepare the SOC Conceptual Design (SIEM, SOAR, XDR, etc.) fit to the size, nature and budget of the Company and the IT Landscape
•- Prepare the Security Strategy for the Enterprise
•- Prepare the Security Policy for the Enterprise
•- Define IT Controls related to Security & Risks
•- Prepare the Physical Security Infrastructure
•- Prepare the IT Risk Assessment & Mitigation, Disaster Recovery Plan
•- Prepare mitigations, controls for Data Leak Prevention
•- Lead and oversee the 3rd Party Penetration and Vulnerability Testing of the fully custom built Marketplace Product
•- Recommend Security implementations within the Cloud Architecture and ICT domain
•- Prepare Security Awareness Program and carry out corresponding trainings
Requirements and skills:
Knowledge of industry standards (e.g., NIST 800-53, ISO 27001, ISO 27018) and data privacy regulations (e.g., GDPR and regional) like the back of their hand
•- Able to design a Security Operations Center (SOC), necessary SOC functions and maturity which fits to the Organizations need by leveraging the best of breed technologies, methodologies, processes and controls
•- History of evaluating and implementing industry standard enterprise-wide security technologies and concepts (think Application Security, Data Loss Prevention, Security Event Management, GRC Tools, Threat and Access Management, among others), web-related technologies (such as, Web applications, Web Services and Service Oriented Architectures), along with network-related protocols
•- Experience with SOC Tooling including SIEM, SOAR and XDR
•- Eye for designing the secure deployment and monitoring of applications and infrastructure into public cloud services (like AWS or Microsoft Azure)
•- Manages Security Operations, Cyberrisk and cyber intelligence, Data loss and fraud prevention
•- Ensures Cybersecurity awareness and training for the Organization
•- Responsible for planning, buying, and rolling out security hardware and software, and making sure IT and network infrastructure is designed with best security practices in mind
•- Experience with Azure Cloud Security is a plus
•- Experience with Microsoft Sentinel and Defender is a plus
Command of languages:
Good command of English
Client company profile:
Our client company is a new venture for one of the region's most established multinational company. Strong backing and commitment from the Shareholders
What they offer:
•- Competitive Compensation Package and Incentive System (13th and 14th Month salary bonus + Annual financial bonus based on company goals)
•- 3 days home office/week, flexible working hours
•- Less Regulation, Fast Moving Agile Organization
•- State of the Art Technologies and Capabilities relying on in-house developed Products and 3rd Party Cloud SaaS / PaaS
•- Lots of room for career growth
•- Efficient Business Operations, lean Processes and low level of Bureaucracy
•- Regional ambition, potential international expansion ahead
Further information:

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility.
Provide direction and guidance on cloud platform services - SaaS and PaaS service models
Design a scalable and flexible data architecture and creation of blueprint(s) for big data use cases solutions in a Hybrid Environment to ensure data assets can be easily integrated and shared across downstream systems (including external cloud partners)
Act as a subject matter expert and collaborate with various internal teams and drive the transformation of their data-sharing capabilities and culture
Lead the Architecture, Design, Build and Run of new Data Models and Data Pipelines. Preparing, Enriching, Normalising, and Modelling data as per the needs of Data Analytics and Data Science activities
Lead knowledge management activities including documentation of data assets to promote data literacy
Develop standards and best practices for building data services for easy access to data consumers in line with security and privacy needs
                Elvárások / Requirements
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science
8-10 years of strong experience in designing and architecting big data, analytics, data warehouse, and business intelligence solutions (Microsoft Azure, SAP BW, BW4HANA)
Deep understanding of architecture design patterns including several layers such as infrastructure, web application, data architecture, and integration architecture
Technical expertise in Microsoft Azure cloud technologies (ADLS, Databricks, Synapse) and understanding of SAP BW, BW4HANA
Strong scripting and automation skills in various languages (such as SQL, Python, and Powershell,)
Strong in data modeling including graph data model
Must have experience working in a large enterprise and be able to communicate effectively with business partners, internal IT teams, and external partners
High levels of energy and enthusiasm to work in a dynamic environment and work towards common objectives
Advantages:
Experience with data virtualization tools/techniques for quick and easy data sharing for large enterprise users
Experience in setup and management of data catalog for the whole enterprise
Hands-on experience in any of data visualization tools such as PowerBI, SAC, Tableau
Effective project management skills including Agile methodologies
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Stable company background and long-term working possibility
Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus
Cafeteria with optional elements
School start support
Data Architect

MINŐSÉGÜGYI RENDSZERMÉRNÖK
(16-2082)
pozícióba.
Feladatok:
Kapcsolattartás az anyacéggel és a folyamatgazdákkal,

Aktív angol VAGY német nyelvtudás, szóban és írásban egyaránt,
Felsőfokú végzettség,
Minőségügyi szabvány és követelmény rendszerek ismerete,
Több éves, autóiparban szerzett minőségügyi tapasztalat.
Amit kínálunk:
Folyamatos fejlődési lehetőség nemzetközi környezetben,
Versenyképes fizetés, kiemelkedő juttatási csomag,
Bejárás támogatása.
A munkavégzés helye: Komárom-Esztergom megye

	küldje el magyar és angol nyelvű önéletrajzát a pozíció megnevezésével és a „16-2082”-es referenciaszám feltüntetésével.

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Are you looking for a job in Finance? Do you speak English, Hungarian and Russian or Ukrainian? Are you highly motivated and do you have a proactive approach? Then there is a great opportunity for you!
Our partner is a global supplier of software engineering and IT outsourcing services. You’ll be part of a team of professionals who are ready to find the best tailor-made IT solutions for their multinational clients in various industries and solve complex problems.
banking operations (creating payment orders, checking bank statements)
assisting the payroll team by the preparation of contracts with employees, signing documents by employees, transfer information to the chief accountant
controlling contracts and invoices from suppliers, systematizing documents, and managing folders and registers
collecting contracts and invoices for the chief accountant every month.
                Elvárások / Requirements
university degree in Economics
intermediate English knowledge, fluent Hungarian and Russian or Ukrainian language knowledge are mandatory
1-2 years of experience in a similar position is an advantage
ability to work with large amounts of information;
checking, editing, and printing primary documentation;
correspondence with counterparties in electronic form;
responsible attitude to work, accuracy, decency, and punctuality;
confident PC user, Word, and Excel.
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Stable long-term work environment
Competitive salary with a flexible system of revisions
Benefits and social packages
Comfortable A+ office in the 13th district of Budapest (Agora)
Every necessary tool and device in the office will be provided to comfortably perform all project tasks
Paid English courses and conversation clubs
Opportunities for professional and personal growth
Mentoring program, internal and external professional training programs
Support and care from our friendly team
Junior Accountant with Slavic languages

As member of the team of Deutsche Telekom Security you will play a major role in the design, implementation and maintenance of coherent sets of policies, processes and systems to handle the security, risks and controls to ensure an appropriate level of information security and compliance for business/enterprise customers consuming IT services from our company.
Your tasks:
Support the development of our security architecture
Assist and advise security organizations in production, service delivery and customer care
Assist the implementation of security management processes
Support and coordinate information security related projects
Help elaborating material and practices for internal purposes and for customers as well
  Qualifications

Basic expertise in IT Service Management practices and processes (e.g. ITIL)
Several years of relevant professional experience
Skill in the use of MS Office applications (incl. Sharepoint)
English spoken and written (C1+)

Do you want to work at a stable company presenting in several different industries? Would you participate in the work of a company that has a people-oriented attitude and where the employees love their workplace? 
Due to the continuous expansion of our client, which occupies a top position in automation, we are looking for an Embedded Firmware Developer professional.
▪ Development of embedded firmware for devices and sensors with focus on a communication forIndustrial Ethernet▪ Definition of the product/firmware specification in the requirement management system▪ Coding, integration, testing and documentation of program code▪ Conceptual design of unit, integration and system tests, execution and evaluation of relatedtests▪ Collaboration with interdisciplinary, distributed product development teams
                Elvárások / Requirements
▪ Studies of electrical engineering, communications technology, computer science focusembedded systems or comparable qualification▪ Professional experience of at least 2-5 years▪ Very good knowledge in C, C++ and Ethernet bus systems▪ Very good experience in the development of embedded systems▪ English knowledge at communication level▪ Good knowledge of the corresponding tool chains (requirement management / developmentsystems)▪ Experience with continuous integration and testing systems▪ Good analytical capabilities▪ Team player
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Besides base salary the package includes premium, cafeteria, health insurance service, commuting support, relocation support

SOFTWARE FEJLESZTŐ 
Feladatok:
		Szoftverfejlesztés és szoftverdizájn,
		Új szoftverfunkciók fejlesztése,
		Szoftver hibák rögzítése és javítása,
		Ügyfél specifikációk elemzése,
		Szoftver specifikációk kidolgozásában való részvétel,
		Modul és integrációs tesztek végrehajtása,
		Szoftverfejlesztéshez kapcsolódó dokumentáció elkészítése,
		Felhasználási esetek kidolgozása és modellezése a fejlesztő csapattal együttműködve.
Elvárások:
		Főiskolai vagy egyetemi végzettség (elsősorban IT, Közlekedésmérnöki vagy Villamosmérnöki területről),
		Legalább 1-3 év fejlesztői gyakorlat objektumorientált programozási nyelven (preferáltan C programnyelv),
		Use case elkészítésében szerzett tapasztalat,
		Hagyományos (Waterfall, V-modell, CMMI) és/vagy agilis fejlesztési módszertanok ismerete,
		Hajlandóság procedurális, erősen típusos nyelveken való fejlesztésre,
		Szoftverminőség biztosítási eszközök ismerete,
		Verziókezelő rendszerek ismerete,
		Hibakezelő rendszerek ismerete,
		Szisztematikus megközelítés a tesztesetek írásánál, átfogó és nem eseti probléma analízis,
		Kommunikációképes angol nyelvtudás szóban és írásban egyaránt.
Előnyök:
		Legalább alapszintű vasúti ismeretek, tapasztalatok biztosító- és jelzőberendezések terén,
		Programozási nyelvek (CHILL vagy PASCAL),
		Szoftverminőség biztosítási eszközök ismerete (Checkstyle, GCov),
		Verziókezelő rendszerek ismerete (ClearCase),
		Hibakezelő rendszerek ismerete (JIRA),
		Német nyelvtudás.
Juttatások:
		Megbízható, stabil vállalati háttér,
		Dinamikus, összetartó csapat,
		Izgalmas projektek,
		Folyamatos szakmai fejlődés lehetősége,
		Kiegyensúlyozott munkakörnyezet.
 Munkavégzés ideje: Hétfőtől – péntekig rugalmas munkarend (heti 40ó)
 Munkavégzés helye: Győr

IT infrastruktúra biztosítása biztonsági, stratégiai folyamatok bevezetésével, valamint ezek folyamatos továbbfejlesztésével
IT rendszertámogatás stratégiájának kialakítása és folyamatos továbbfejlesztése 
Fejlesztési koncepciók megtervezése a meglévő infrastruktúra kiértékelése alapján. Projektek kezdeményezése és vezetése stratégiai IT megoldások megállapítására és bevezetésére
Tanácsadás alkalmazássokkal és infrastruktúrával kapcsolatos kérdésekben, figyelembe véve a komplex rendszerek különböző platformjait és kapcsolatait 
Költségtervezés és kontrolling különös tekintettel az outsourcing szolgáltató szolgáltatásaira
                Elvárások / Requirements
Befejezett informatikai, mérnöki vagy releváns természettudományi felsőfokú tanulmányok
ITIL-tapasztalat
Tárgyalóképes angoltudás szóban és írásban

IT HD technikus 
Amennyiben ezt az állást a MÁV-csoport egyik munkavállalója javasolta számodra, jelentkezésedkor választd ki a Munkavállalói ajánlási program pontot és töltsd ki az ajánló adatait!
Új munkatársunk feladatai lesznek
- első szintű ügyfélszolgálati támogatás ellátása a HelpDesk-en
- hibabejelentések beazonosítása, a feladatok eszkalációja
- bejelentések, hibajegyek rögzítése, nyomon követése a végleges megoldásig
- az on-line rendszerek monitorozási, rendszer-felügyeleti teendőinek ellátása
- szoftverek, alkalmazások távoli telepítése, és első színtű hibaelhárítása
- havária feladatok kezelése
- ügyfélszolgálati rendszerben történő adminisztráció
Amire a munkakör betöltéséhez szükség van
- szakirányú középfokú állami iskolai végzettség, vagy általános érettségi és szakirányú középfokú végzettség
- MS Windows operációs és irodai rendszerek professzionális ismerete
- a következő alkalmazások ismerete: Office alkalmazások; Active Directory; szerver konzolalkalmazások; távmenedzselő eszközök; ügyfélszolgálati rendszerek
- IP hálózatok alapfokú ismerete
- 1 év szakmai gyakorlat
Tulajdonságok, melyek számunkra fontosak
- önállóság, megbízhatóság, fegyelmezett, precíz munkavégzés
- rendszerszemlélet, kreativitás, problémamegoldó képesség, proaktivitás
- szakmai összefoglaló, lényeglátó képesség
- csapatmunka iránti nyitottság
- ügyfélorientált kommunikációs készség
Előnyként értékeljük
- nagyvállalati környezetben, technológiai rendszerek üzemeltetésében szerzett gyakorlat
- 7x24 órás munkavégzésre való hajlandóság
- hardverek (Desktop/Szerver) ismerete
Amit ajánlunk
- hosszú távú foglalkoztatási biztonság
- támogató munkahelyi légkör
- bruttó munkabér 4%-ának megfelelő összegű önkéntes nyugdíjpénztári támogatás havonta
- bruttó 6.016,- Ft /hó önkéntes egészségpénztári tagdíj-kiegészítés munkabérből való legalább nettó 2.000,- Ft /hó tagdíj levonása esetén
- vasúti utazási igazolvány biztosítása (szabályozás szerinti hozzátartozók részére is)
Munkavégzés helye
Záhony
Munkaidő
Teljes munkaidő
Foglalkoztatás formája
Határozatlan idejű
Jelentkezés határideje
2023-04-16
Vállalati bemutatkozó
A MÁV Szolgáltató Központ Zrt. a MÁV-Volán-csoport egyik leányvállalata, feladatköre sokrétű: szolgáltatási szerződéssel rendelkező megbízói – főleg, de nem kizárólag a MÁV-Volán-csoport vállalatai – számára pénzügyi, számviteli tevékenységet, humán és munkavédelmi szolgáltatást, vasúti oktatást, raktár- és készletgazdálkodást, informatikai szolgáltatást és ügyviteli feladatokat lát el, valamint felelős a beszerzési, környezetvédelmi, szállítási, flottakezelési és leltározási szolgáltatások biztosításáért is. Megrendelői támogatásához hat üzletág biztosítja a szolgáltatásokat.

TERMÉKFEJLESZTŐ VILLAMOSMÉRNÖK 
HAJDU Hajdúsági Ipari Zrt.
Nagy múltú, hőtechnikai- és megújuló energiás készülékek, valamint háztartási gépek gyártásával és értékesítésével foglalkozó vállalat
TERMÉKFEJLESZTŐ VILLAMOSMÉRNÖK
munkakör betöltésére munkatársat keres.
Főbb feladatok:
Az új termékekkel szemben támasztott követelmények meghatározása.
Vonatkozó villamossági szabványok és jogszabályok alapos ismerete, alkalmazása a termékfejlesztés folyamata során.
Termékek elektronikai egységeinek hardveres és szoftveres fejlesztése.
Erős- és gyengeáramú gyártmánydokumentációk elkészítése és karbantartásának folyamatos biztosítása.
Szükség szerinti részvétel a termékfejlesztéshez kapcsolódó laborvizsgálatokban, mintakészülékek építésében.
Terméktanúsítási folyamatok koordinálása, kapcsolattartás vizsgálóintézetekkel.
Személyi és szakmai elvárások:
Villamosmérnök végzettség
Tervezői CAD rendszerek ismerete (Fusion 360/Eagle, MPLABX; Solid Edge ismerete előny)
Szabványismeret
Felhasználói szintű számítógépes ismeret (Outlook, Excel, Word)
Integrált vállalatirányítási és dokumentációkezelő rendszer ismerete
Társalgási szintű angol nyelvtudás; német nyelvtudás előny
„B” kategóriás gépjárművezetői engedély
Amit mi ajánlunk:
Szakmai kihívás, fejlődési lehetőség.
Csapatmunkában, projektekben való részvétel.
Fizetés megállapodás szerint, béren kívüli egyéb juttatások

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Salesforce Administrator 
As a Salesforce Administrator you will be responsible for the ongoing development, support and maintenance of our Salesforce.com platform, within a small team of Product Owners, Salesforce Architects, Developers and Admins.
This position is for you if you are a communicative and analytical person, interested in growing your career and with a record of success in improving processes and adoption using the Force.com platform.
The is a full-time position based in our Budapest office.
Your responsibilities
Assist in training of new users, and grow the Salesforce.com skill set across the organization
Effectively act as the liaison between our users and the application development teams
Work independently with members of the user community to define and document development requirements
Focus the organization’s use of data towards what best serves the mission
Work with our management team to establish suitable processes to support administrative, development, and change management activities
Maintaining the documentation of current functionalities
Serve as system administrator for the Salesforce.com environment
Handle all basic administrative functions including user account maintenance, reports and dashboards, workflows and other routine tasks
Complete regular internal system audits and prepare for upgrades
Become a trusted subject area expert in the technical ecosystem that powers our business
Skills required  
Excellent project management skills and a positive attitude
Demonstrated ability to meet deadlines, handle and prioritize simultaneous requests, and manage laterally and upwards
Creative and analytical thinker with strong problem-solving skills
Must demonstrate exceptional verbal and written communication skills
Must demonstrate ability to communicate effectively at all levels of the organization
Ability to critically evaluate information gathered from multiple sources, reconcile conflicts, decompose high-level information into details, abstract up from low-level information to a general understanding, and distinguish user requests from the underlying true needs
Ability to assess the impact of new requirements on Salesforce.com and all upstream and downstream applications, systems and processes   
Experience required  
Minimum three years of experience as a Salesforce.com administrator
com Admin certified
Sales Cloud, Service Cloud and Developer certifications preferred
Proven ability to design and implement new processes and facilitate user adoption
Strong understanding of the platform, with the ability to build custom apps and objects, formula fields, workflows, custom views, and other content of intermediate complexity
Strong understanding of Salesforce.com best practices and functionality
Strong data management abilities
A documented history of successfully driving projects to completion
A demonstrated ability to understand and articulate complex requirements
Experience with nonprofit processes preferred
Previous experience working in a SCRUM or agile environment preferred

Salesforce Marketing Cloud Specialist 
Our client, specialised in language education, is looking for a Salesforce Marketing Cloud Specialist.
As a Salesforce Marketing Specialist, you would be part of an international marketing team responsible for helping to create our worldwide marketing automation strategy and ensuring that it is implemented and executed flawlessly at a local market level.
 Your responsibilities are: 
 • Building and implementing customer journeys in SFMC with multiple channels
• Creating data extensions out using SQL
• Producing dynamic content emails
• Providing reporting and analysis solutions
• Utilization of relevant modules within Marketing Cloud
• Keeping up to date with developments in SFMC
  The ideal candidate should have: 
 • Experience in Salesforce Marketing Cloud
• SQL and AmpScript knowledge
• Previous business facing experience. Some business facing travel may be required.
• Ability to work effectively in a fast paced, entrepreneurial environment
• Great attention to detail, excellent organisation and communication skills and a strong analytical ability
• Four-year college degree (computer science, computer technology or similar degree) preferred
• Fluency in English. (Any other language is an advantage)

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Frontend Architect 
Your new company
Our Partner is an industry-leading cheminformatics software company helping early-stage drug discovery and chemistry research for more than 20 years. Our clients are top pharmaceutical companies, innovative biotech startups, and leading academic institutions. 
We are agile, innovative and friendly, offering compelling opportunities for frequent collaboration and cross-training with teammates and stakeholders. We operate internationally, with regional teams based in Budapest (HQ), Prague, Boston, San Diego and Basel (Switzerland), along with distributors in the Asia Pacific. We are in an exciting time of organizational and business growth, so now is the perfect time to join our team! 
Your new role
We are looking for a Frontend Architect who is a senior technology expert and can be a great addition to our Architect team. You would be a key contributor of Platform Architecture and Technology Vision specialized in front-end technologies. By the time you are going to be the expert of the cheminformatics domain and you will gain a deep and wide knowledge of frontend technology used at our partner, so your scope will be a broad and impactful one.
Designing the architecture of a modular, extensible front-end framework to realize the consistent UI and UX of x platform applications.
Close collaboration with the UX team on defining requirements and goals
Architectural supervision of the teams developing components or products with front-end elements to ensure consistency and alignment with the common architecture.
Technology alignment of development teams in line with the company standards and goals. Execute common technical decisions
Ensure the alignment with company security standards
Defining architecture and technical guidelines in accordance with and technology strategy
Give technical advice or guidance to the development teams
Represent the front-end aspects in technical discussions, in particular, raise awareness of technical needs of the front-end development
Contribute to company-level technology strategy
Giving or organizing training, presentations and other knowledge sharing events
Create technical specifications, white papers and other technical material that can be used to help sales or improve customer experience
Research difficult problems and evaluate emerging technologies to shape the long-term technology roadmap
Partner Product Managers and Product Directors with technical advice
Promote a strong, positive engineering culture within the group
To be a role model of Developers, demonstrating x values
What you'll need to succeed
Deep understanding of software craftsmanship, hands on experience in software development
Solid understanding of software architecture concepts In particular, knowledge of:
UI and frontend development
UI, frontend and related technologies (JavaScript, TypeScript, CSS, HTML, XML, Angular, React, NodeJS etc.)
Microservice architecture
Micro-frontend architecture
Cloud computing
Web services
Web applications
Asynchronous architectures
High availability and scalability concepts
Multi-tenant applications
Infrastructure as code
Strong English language skills (both written and spoken)
Bonus skills that will help you hit the ground running
Strong communication and presentation skills
Strong interpersonal skills
Strong leadership skill, the ability to influence people
Ability to coach and mentor others
Analytical skills, system thinking
What you'll get in return
Hybrid-way of working (8 days/month home office)
Private health insurance (Medicover)
Generous annual training budget supporting your professional development (off-site training, international conferences, e-books)
We work with global Top500 companies (R&D) and leading academic institutions, giving you a chance to gain insights into these dynamically evolving industries.
Inspiring working environment - leisure and recreation area, playing corner for children, English lessons, yearly user conference with social programs, innovation days 
You will be a valued member of a creative and supportive agile team 
Everyday use of English in a multicultural environment
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Senior Embedded Software Engineer 
Your new company
A leading software and hardware provider on the emerging Vehicle-to-Vehicle and Vehicle-to-Infrastructure (V2X) communication market, with a mission to increase traffic safety and efficiency on the road.
Your new role
Development of our complex V2X software stack for different regions (such as EU, US, Japan) with networking, transport, and facility services.
Implement support for Linux and various hard-real-time platforms with different HW components.
Development of API bindings for external devices and various purposes.
Development of applications for safety and optimization purposes.
What you'll need to succeed
Technical requirements:
Programming experience in C language. Detailed knowledge of C99 means an advantage.
Experience in Linux-based software development, using Linux as a development platform.
Solid understanding of network systems and protocols.
Advantages:
Experience with AUTOSAR and Adaptive AUTOSAR environments as a developer.
Experience with embedded Linux system development (e.g. DD-WRT, OpenWRT, Yocto, OpenEmbedded).
Experience with automotive coding standards (e.g. MISRA).
Experience with real-time operating systems.
Experience with elliptic curve or other public-key cryptography solutions.
General requirements:
Computer Science or Software Engineering degree or equivalent work experience.
At least 5 years of relevant work experience.
Ability to meet deadlines.
Ability and willingness to learn quickly, analyze and solve tasks independently and proactively
Working knowledge of English.
What you'll get in return
Market and trends overview of the automotive industry, Intelligent Transportation Systems (ITS), autonomous cars and the technologies that will be built in every vehicle in the following years 
Opportunity to grow professionally in a dynamic working environment 
A long-term career opportunity in building a Budapest based tech company rapidly growing to the global markets (EU, US, Asia) 
Flexible working hours 
Steady work in a cooperative and friendly team 
Competitive salary 
Cafeteria and Private health insurance

Our products are combinations of software, mechatronics and electronics that can enable level 4/5 automation across a variety of industrial applications. Our people are at the heart of what we do, come join us!
Due to rapid business growth, we require the services of talented Embedded Software Systems Test Engineers.
Key responsibilities for this role include:
Deliver highly reliable embedded software systems for automotive/military spec. hardware, including battery management systems, motor drivers, body control and communications modules;
Work in a professional cross-functional team environment to develop new products, from prototype through production;
Take ownership of our state of the art test tools, processes and methods, including traceability matrix and writing documentation;
Follow the safety-critical testing processes and implement/execute a fully automated test environment for safety critical systems.
Required Skills and Experience
A bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Electronics Engineering and/or Computer Science;
Proficient in Mathworks and Dspace testing;
Minimum of 5 years experience in embedded software systems testing in the automotive and/or robotics industries;
Experience with manual and full automation testing;
Highly skilled in building and executing testing against black-box, white-box, regression, performance, boundary, functional, non-functional, stress and safety requirements;
Sound experience with the full software development lifecycle (SDLC) through requirements, design, implementation, testing and support;
Experience with ASPICE/CMMI, ISO26262 are mandatory and experience with ISO14229, IEC61508 are highly regarded;
Experience with embedded OS such as RTOS or VxWorks highly regarded;
Embedded software development/coding experience is highly regarded;
Ability to be a key member of a high performing team;
Experience working in a fast-paced environment dealing with complex and multiple tasks;
Ability to analyse problems and come up with innovative solutions;
Ability to be adaptable and flexible to business needs;
Excellent communication and organisation skills;
Fluent written and verbal communication skills in English.

Functional Safety Engineer 
We are looking for a talented Functional Safety Engineer to join our growing team.
The candidate will report to our TBA (Engineering Manager – Integration & Test OR Software). You will work on the design, development, and integration of our world-class electric vehicle control systems.
As the Functional Safety engineering you will lead all activities relating to Functional Safety activities working closely with cross domain engineering teams, key program and customer stakeholders and certification/regulatory agencies.
You will be involved from a Functional Safety perspective in the Conceptual, Architectural, Design and Test phases of product development. The functional safety work products will be critical for certification for application deployment.
It will be important that you are able to articulate, coach and champion Functional Safety requirements and best practices throughout the organisation.
As the Functional Safety Engineer, you will be a key portal for information internally and externally relating to this subject.
Requirements:
A passionate interest in electric transport/mobility and an interest in developing new generations of electric mobility solutions.
A qualification in Electrical or Computer Systems Engineering.
Implementation of the requirements adhering to functional safety standard ISO 26262
Leading and coordination of creation of functional safety work products according to ISO 26262
Experience using safety analysis (HARA, FTA, HAZOP, FMEA) and tools (PLM).
Experience development of Functional Safety Concepts, Technical Safety Requirements and Technical Safety Concpets with relevant domain engineering teams.
Established safety validation plans with relevant test engineers.
Strong understanding of product development for automotive and ISO 26262, ASIL decomposition, safety mechanism.
Demonstrated execution experience in delivering functional safety projects.
Excellent understanding of the EV vehicle and its main core components
A strong analytical ability and being able to articulate the findings to keystake holders.
Great interpersonal and communication skills with an ability to articulate technical content,
Support of ISO 26262 TUV certification
Other Useful Experience:
Industry experience with IEC61508
Experience working closely with electrical and software engineering teams on safety critical systems with human interaction.
Strong written and oral communication skills.
Ability to mentor, coach and arbitrate with your engineering peers.
Industry experience in robotics, automotive or similar.
Experienced in product development within an A-Spice framework

They are looking for a software engineer specialist in Front-end, who together organize all necessary engineering tasks and help maximise the flow of value. As a software engineer, you will work shoulder to shoulder with other software engineers, like backend specialists, data scientists, domain experts, and frontline staff to shape the future of our partner and the aviation industry.
Your new role
As a Front-end specialist, you will apply your skills to change the way our partner works, driving innovation and transforming them into a truly data-driven organization. They value both technical expertise (analysis, design & architecture, engineering, quality assurance and DevSecOps) as well as the interpersonal parts of the job (coaching, consulting, coordination, and support). 
 As a software engineer Front-end, your key result areas are:
Make use of right technology and govern architecture for products in line with the organizational objectives, ensuring that the right technologies are chosen to strike an optimal balance between achieving business goals, realizing functional and technical requirements, and managing technical debt, development costs and continuity costs 
Design and implement the overall architecture aligned with other optimizers for the product to deliver
Translate business needs into compelling products and deliver them to end users so that business value is created 
Take care of specification, design, engineering, testing, delivery, maintenance, monitoring, and support of digital products
Foster a culture where state-of-the-art approaches, tooling and technologies are applied as fits with the mission of the department, the KPI’s and desired business impact
What you'll need to succeed
Preferably Bachelor degree or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering or other relevant fields
Minimum of 5 years of professional experience with JavaScript / TypeScript, HTML, CSS and SASS

Knowledge of continuous integration/continuous deployment techniques and tools (Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, Bamboo)
Proficient with automated testing (e.g., Unit tests, End-2-End tests)
Experience with Bootstrap, tailwind or other CSS frameworks
Experience with bringing enterprise Front-end applications to production and supporting Front-enders in industrializing their code
Experience in coaching and knowledge sharing to familiarize teams with software engineering best practices
Knowledge with and experience in agile way of working (e.g., SAFe, Scrum, Agile)
Great communication skills, written and spoken (English) and team spirit 
This role requires participation in their on-call support rotation every six weeks
All their teams have a hybrid way of working, they do ask you to come to the office every so often to meet your colleagues, to participate in trainings or team events.

Experience with other frontend frameworks (e.g., React, Vue.js)
Experience with Node.js, NestJS and GraphQL.
Experience with state management like NGRX or Redux
Experience with UX design

The role provides opportunities to apply leading edge craftsmanship and enable impact across their organization. You will be working with talented, driven people within and outside your field, on cutting-edge technology and with top-level equipment. They offer a clear career path with ample opportunity for growth. ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Senior DevOps Engineer (AWS) 
Your new company
In the IT Services area, they implement the best in class solutions in the Business 4.0 era to enable strong digital foundations for our customers worldwide. We are working with a wide range of technologies and programming languages. 
Your new role
Manage incidents on the core platform where other applications are running. Stability is key. 
Depending on the nature of problems, you propose and implement solutions in collaboration with other teams. 
You guide other teams so that they can be autonomous in the DevOps part of their applications.
Scope of applications, some examples:
>Orchestration and interfacing, including all object conversions, between a mathematical kernel and electrical vehicle charging stations, including the scheduling of processing tasks, monitoring, error handling, communication with other web services, communication with embedded devices
>Industrial IoT data collection system, with monitoring, alerting and dashboarding features.
>Industrialization end-to-end of an existing prototype, including a mathematical kernel and in collaboration with a math colleague, e.g., the estimation of the mechanical stress of a boiler based on historical data. 
What you'll need to succeed
AWS Cloud solution: AWS S3, CloudFront, EC2, EKS, KMS, EBS, EFS, RDS, SNS, SES, ELB, Route53 
Ansible, Kubernetes, Docker 
Redis, Kafka, MongoDB, InfluxDB, Elastic search, Nginx 
NewRelic, Fluentd, Vagrant 
Linux, Git, Gitlab, Gitlab CI
Nice to have:  
Knowledge of VirtualBox 
Experience with OAuth2, OpenIDConnect 
Knowledge of Python development is a plus 
Familiarity with PyCharm, Conda 
What you'll get in return
Delivering services from Hungary since 2001, making us a perfect choice if you’re looking for stability. 
We provide a wide range of benefits, including a market leading comprehensive private health care package. 
We offer extensive self-development opportunities: our colleagues have a multitude of training possibilities for personal and professional growth. 
There are both vertical and horizontal career options for those who like to challenge themselves and try out different areas and positions. 
You will be part of a global and diverse working environment with relaxation areas, terraces, and a friendly atmosphere. 
You can seize the day with us at our company events, hobby clubs, and sporting initiatives. 
An attractive compensation package.

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Scrum Master 
With over 200 years of experience in industry and cutting-edge technologies thyssenkrupp is active in automotive engineering, logistics, plant technology, steel production and much more. Our group have more than 106,000 employees in nearly 80 countries and annual sales of €42 billion.
In the Hungarian development center with our engineering team of 1000 we are present as an innovative and significant partner in one of the fastest growing and most exciting segment of the automotive industry, in the field of electromechanical steering systems. With outstanding quality and high-tech developments we meet the needs of renowned car manufacturers and our developments can be found in 25 % of the manufactured cars all over the world. Our engineers work on new challenges that can change the future of automotive. 
 Tasks / Feladatok
The Scrum Master supports our development teams. You are responsible for developing and enhancing our existing Agile framework and for ensuring that each team member follows this framework. You make sure everyone knows their role and helps coach them through any unclear parts while also guiding larger teams using this method effectively.
Consulting with the team members
Work closely with the assigned Agile teams and increase their effectiveness
Improving the functioning of teams by presenting, understanding and adapting different methodologies and tools
Participates in skill development and attitude formation
Facilitating ceremonies defined by the Agile framework (e.g. sprint planning, sprint review, retrospective)
Keep trainings on Agile principles, methodologies and tools
Help team members to develop their communication skills. Help to understand individual methods and tools and to manage conflicts
Finds the best methods and tools and incorporates them into the daily work
Supporting the development team to remove their blockers
Supporting the management in the identification of improvement opportunities and in the implementation of new methodologies and processes
 Requirements / Elvárások
Bachelor's degree in computer science, information technology, or a relevant field preferred
In-depth knowledge and practical application of Agile Principles
Experience in using Agile Lifecycle Management tools (preferably JIRA)
Experience in creating training materials and conducting trainings
3+ years of experience in Scrum Master / Agile Coach
Fluent English in spoken and written
Leadership skills:
Always communicate in a transparent and authentic way
Determining and managing tasks, issues, risks, and action items
Scheduling and moderating events, meetings, and decision-making processes
Monitoring progress and performance and helping teams to make improvements
Preparing and presenting status reports to stakeholders
Actively involved in the development of the corporate culture and mindset change
Personality:
Good problem-solving and conflict management skills
Proactivity
Open to new things / technologies
Active attention, empathy
Result oriented and practical thinking
Strong interpersonal, networking, communication and facilitation skills
Efficient, independent and team oriented form of work
 Offer / Ajánlatunk
A modern office in the 11th district is waiting for you to support your creativity with fun community places, cafe rooms, an own cinema and a skybar
You can be part of a successful and growing company in the field of technology
We support you with flexible working hours and home office opportunity (60 % of the working time in many of our positions)
Competitive salary and wide range of other benefits (cafeteria & bonus) are provided to you
You can learn new languages in small groups, selecting from 5 languages
We organize leisure time activities (board games, sport activities)

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Aegon is a multinational financial services group headquartered in The Hague, the Netherlands. The company has multiple locations across the globe, with core markets in The Netherlands, UK and the US, growth markets in China, Brazil and Iberia and an Asset Management organization with locations in UK, US, NL and Hungary. Aegon Global Business Solution Center is supporting these businesses with IT, Finance, Risk, Model Validation, Actuarial, Audit and Asset management services with a growing team of approx. 300 people, based in Budapest, Hungary.
At Aegon, we foster a diverse workforce and an inclusive culture. We are a people business, and we recognize that delivering excellent client outcomes comes from harnessing distinct perspectives. We value diversity in the full range of human uniqueness without limitation, including race, gender, ability, language, culture, beliefs, age, origin, background, perspectives, and experiences.
This dynamic role requires broad understanding of red team operations and penetration testing principles to support Aegon’s Security program.
As a part of the Red Team team within the global SOC, you will be a part of the Security Operations team responsible for unannounced red team operations and managing penetration tests. The Red Team conducts advanced adversary emulation operations to challenge assumptions and emulate cyber and criminal threat actors targeting or attacking the business.
As a Red Team member, you will participate in the design and execution of campaign-based security operations for Aegon, spanning a varying array of targets. Successful team members must be capable of evaluating environments, applications, systems or processes to discover weaknesses, and subsequently leverage those discoveries into actionable real-world attack strategies.
To succeed in this role the candidate will possess breadth and depth of knowledge in security of operating systems, networking and protocols, firewalls, databases and middleware applications, forensics, scripting and programing. Red team members are expected to continuously improve theirtradecraft through research, to add breadth and depth to their knowledge.
What You Will Do: 
Find new and creative ways to break technology through either Red Team or Purple Team operations
Plan, scope, and implement large scale covert operations that have sophisticated goals and significant impact
Develop new adversary tools, techniques, or methodologies
Threat Hunting opportunities to partner with the teams Threat Hunters, using our special adversarial talents to discover and eradicate threats
Engagement in all phases of Red Team security operations
Work within the Red Team to perform physical exploitation, network exploitation and social engineering assessments against authorized targets
Perform network reconnaissance and open source intelligence gathering
Configure and safely utilize attack tools, tactics, and procedures against authorized targets
Develop scripts, tools, or methodologies to enhance red teaming capabilities
Effectively communicate findings and strategy to client stakeholders including technical staff, executive leadership, and legal counsel
Provide risk-appropriate and pragmatic recommendations to correct identified flaws, vulnerabilities and misconfigurations
Lead projects in mid to high level complexity
Mentor other more junior members of the team
                Elvárások / Requirements
Do No Harm approach: operational objectives cannot come at the expense of others
Growth Mindset. Excited for opportunities to solve new problems every day
Helpful demeanor. We are trusted adversaries and that trust needs to remain strong
Customization of Adversarial Tools: Cobalt Strike BOFs, Mythic Agent profiles, and adding new exploits to MSF are examples
Defender experience and knowledge. Utilizing Splunk and finding risks
Web application penetration testing assessments
Email, phone, or physical social-engineering assessments
Developing, extending, or modifying exploits, shell code or exploit tools
Network penetration testing and manipulation of network infrastructure
Relevant, recent and verifiable experience in information security and adversary simulation
Detailed knowledge of global cyber threats, threat actors, and the tactics, techniques and procedures used by cyber adversaries, specifically those targeting the financial services sector
Experience with Red, Blue, or Purple teaming exercises
Industry certifications such as OSCP, OSCE, OSWE, GPEN, GCIH, GWAPT, or GXPN
Five + years cyber security engineering experience
Ability to define and communicate complex technical risk problems, concepts and situations to multiple skill levels; including business personnel with little to no cyber experience
Proficiency with Microsoft Office, Preference given to candidates with deep Excel and PowerPoint skill sets
Experience with systems such as Service Now, JIRA, and equivalent
Ability to fluently read, write and speak English
Experience with leading group discussion and presenting to varying levels and audiences
Self-motivated and self-management skills
Preferred Skills, Education and Certifications:
Strong knowledge of Penetration Testing and covert Red Team operations and Information Security demonstrated by one or more of the following:
Bachelor degree in Information/Cyber Security, Information Risk, Information Risk Management or equivalent experience
Bachelor degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Information Management or similar four year technical degree or equivalent experience, combined with one or more of the following:
Active Cyber Security certifications
Experience in Insurance, Payments, Banking or other Fin-Tech Industries
Strong preference for candidate with excellent Excel and PowerPoint skills
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Competitive salary
Comprehensive health package
Brand new office at an excellent location
Hybrid working
Opportunities for growth and advancement
A highly people centric, positive and supportive work environment
Senior Red Team Operations & Penetration Testing Analyst 
Elmentem az állást
Randstad Hungary Kft. 
Budapest 
Teljes munkaidős
