What you'll need to succeed: 
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related Engineering discipline (or equivalent).
4+ years of hands-on JavaScript/TypeScript development experience.
Robust design and development skills in React.
Very good design pattern knowledge and enterprise integration paradigms.
Test-driven mindset.
Experience teaching and mentoring other engineers in new technologies.
Knowledge of software best practices like refactoring, Clean Code, Domain Driven Design, and SOLID principles.
For this role it would be nice if you have:
Experience working with CSS or SCSS.
Experience working with web services and REST API development.
Experience working with AWS.
Experience working with Electron.
Experience working with MobX.
Experience working with GitHub and GitHub Actions.

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
SAP FI-CO Supporter 
thyssenkrupp is an international group of companies comprising largely independent industrial and technology businesses and employing 96,000 people. Across 48 countries it generated sales of €41 billion in fiscal year 2021/22. Backed by extensive technological know-how, the businesses develop cost-effective and resource-friendly solutions to the challenges of the future, especially in the fields of climate protection, the energy transition, digital transformation in the industry and mobility of the future.
In the Hungarian development center with our engineering team of 1000 we are present as an innovative and significant partner in one of the fastest growing and most exciting segment of the automotive industry, in the field of electromechanical steering systems. With outstanding quality and high-tech developments we meet the needs of renowned car manufacturers and our developments can be found in 25 % of the manufactured cars all over the world. Our engineers work on new challenges that can change the future of automotive.

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Client is a leading European airline. Their IT is a strong mature agile organization with over 1.000 internal employees worldwide – but they are starting fresh in Budapest with a new start-up this year.
Are you looking for a chance to work in truly European spirit with their future technological developments?Together you fly 110 aircraft to 145 destinations, bringing millions of passengers to where they need to be, developing sustainable travel and pushing the boundaries of air travel towards to the future.
Very briefly, you will be working on some of their core systems that support our Client's flying crew members. From systems that enable planning and rostering of their crew to ensuring the right catering is placed onboard every flight, the 3 domains within Flight have a very diverse application landscape. Through your work, you will have a direct impact on their crew, their aircrafts, and their customers.
They offer a very open environment for you to grow and expand your talents, together you will contribute to their goal of becoming the number one data- and technology-driven airline.
In addition:
You will supervise a number of software engineers;You will be the link between your department and the rest of the business;You will be part of the tech management and you will give direction to technical solutions;You will work with different programming tools
                Elvárások / Requirements
You love complex problems and enjoy solving them even more. You are not afraid of change. In fact, you want to constantly improve our Client's services. You speak various programming languages, but also enjoy coaching and guiding software engineers. Your will be working in an environment that at this moment also relies on planning & rostering systems or SAP (catering), knowledge on integrating COTS in custom applications and experience with DevOps is a pre.
Additionally, you have:A college or university degree, preferably in IT or engineering;Good knowledge of the English language
A strong knowledge of different programming languages:Java;TypeScript
Preferred but not necessary, secondary experience in:Front end (Angular);DevOps;More than 7 years of proven experience in software development;Proven leadership experience
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
A challenging role at a unique European company

A personal budget for sustainable employability

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Client is committed to making sustainable, reliable, and affordable energy a reality by pushing the boundaries of what is possible. They uphold a 150-year legacy of innovation that encourages our search for people who will support their focus on decarbonization, new technologies, and energy transformation.
Software engineering of innovative MPC solutions for improved start-up and operation of power-plants and implementation of these optimal control solutions in real power-plants worldwide
Setup and verification of transient process models
Ongoing development and maintenance of software for solving of non-linear optimization problems in Python, C++ or in Modelica
Execution of projects for online performance optimization of power-plants
Customizing the SW as per project specific requirements
Integration, testing, documentation, review
Collaboration in international teams
                Elvárások / Requirements
Expert Level:
Degree in computer science, engineering, physics or (applied) mathematics (PhD is an advantage)
Python including Pytest, Numpy, Pandas
Git and Gitlab CI/CD.
Non-linear dynamic Optimization with direct approach (Collocation).
Business fluent English language (if you can speak in German it is a plus but it is not expected)
 Advanced Level:
Formulation and solution of dynamic optimization problems.
Solving performance and robustness issues with non-linear optimization problems.
Transient behavior of (power) plants.
Model based control technology.
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Competitive salary level (based on your professional background)

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Ügyfelünk egy rendezvény-technika területén nemzetközi szinten elismert magyar vállalat, akiknek a budapesti központjukba keressük Security Architect kollégáját.
TE VAGY AZ IDEÁLIS JELÖLT SZÁMUNKRA, HA:
szívesen határozod meg az üzleti oldalról érkező igények technológiai megvalósításának lehetőségeit, valamint választod ki az optimális megoldást, műszaki koncepciót;
szereted szükség esetén “proof-of-concept” szinten, példaprogramokkal validálni a technológiai megvalósítás működőképességét;
szívesen méred fel a beágyazott rendszereink és felhasználói szoftvereink biztonsági kockázatait, és határozod meg a szükséges biztonsági megoldásokat;
örömmel támogatod a fejlesztő és tesztelő csapatokat;
fontos számodra, hogy jövőállóságot szem előtt tartva készítsd el a megoldás magas szintű szoftverterveit;
folyamatosan nyomon követed az iparági/szakmai legjobb gyakorlatokat, trendeket, ajánlásokat és szívesen koordinálod ezek beépítését a fejlesztési módszertanokba.
                Elvárások / Requirements
EHHEZ MINDENKÉPP SZÜKSÉGES, HOGY LEGYEN:
villamosmérnök vagy mérnök-informatikus főiskolai vagy egyetemi végzettséged;
informatikai biztonsági szabványok, IT technológiák terén ismereted;
sérülékenységek és biztonsági rések azonosításában szerzett többévnyi tapasztalatod;
gyakorlati jártasságod biztonsági megoldások alkalmazásában (Cryptography, keying, PKI, TLS);
analitikus, rendszerszemléletű gondolkodásmódod;
stratégia-alkotási képességed;
rutinod abban, hogy különbözőterületek szakértőivel egy csapatban hogyan lehet jól együtt dolgozni; 
tárgyalóképes angol nyelvtudásod;
nagyfokú önállóságod a feladataid végzése során.
ELŐNY HA RENDELKEZEL:
ismersz biztonsági szabványokat (pl. ISO 27002, ISO 27018);
releváns minősítésekkel rendelkezel (pl. CISSP, CEH, CISA, CISM);
van etikus hekker tapasztalatod;
van tapasztalatod agilis módszertan szerinti működésben.
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
AMIT MI TUDUNK BIZTOSÍTANI, HOGY JÓL ÉREZD MAGAD NÁLUNK:
versenyképes jövedelmet és többféle egyéb juttatás; 
fél év betanulás után heti 2 nap home office lehetőség;
részese lehetsz egy magyar cég sikerének a világpiacon;
dinamikusan fejlődő és stabil háttér;
jó hangulatú, fiatalos légkör;
emberközpontú szemlélet;
meghallgatjuk az ötleteidet;
belvárosi, jól megközelíthető iroda;
magas színvonalú csapatépítő tréningeket és egyéb közösségépítő programok.

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Ügyfelünk fő profilja videotechnikai berendezések tervezése és gyártása. Részt vesznek többek között rendezvények, koncertek vizuális támogatásában, de foglalkoznak modernizált tárgyalók kialakításától kezdve a sorozatgyártáson át, az orvos technikáig, számtalan izgalmas projekttel. 
a cég által fejlesztett videotechnikai berendezések szoftverének fejlesztése;
részvétel a termék- és szoftverspecifikálásban, az architektúra tervezésben és a szoftver teljes fejlesztési folyamatában;
új készülékek belső működtetésének kitalálása, megvalósítása és kipróbálása már a fejlesztési fázisban, amelyek az általad fejlesztett szoftverrel működnek;
jól strukturált, igényes kód írása.

legalább 3 év Linux alkalmazás fejlesztői tapasztalatod van;
jó vagy valamilyen script nyelvben (pl. Bash, Shell, Python, JavaScript, nodeJS);
Git verziókövető ismereted;
rendszerszemléletű gondolkodásmódod;
szakmai angol nyelvismerettel rendelkezel.
Előnyt jelent, ha:
szereztél már tapasztalatot beágyazott rendszerek fejlesztésében;
van modern C++ ismereted (C++17);
van GNU Make, gcc, gdb felhasználói szintű tapasztalatod;
rendelkezel Continuous Integration tapasztalattal (pl. Jenkins);
van systemd ismereted;
vannak hálózati és IT biztonsági ismereteid;
dolgoztál már agilis fejlesztési környezetben.

végigkövetheted a teljes fejlesztési folyamatot, és kipróbálhatod a működő eredményt;
meghallgatják az ötleteidet, legyen szó termékekről vagy akár folyamatokról;

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our client is a leader in one of the fastest and biggest sectors of entertainment - mobile games! They are a dynamic and experienced team in London and Budapest who have set theirselves the goal to improve and change the mobile games industry forever. They help game developers and distribution channels generate more revenue from games by expanding reach and distribution. They went public on Nasdaq in Stockholm in 2018 and since then they have been picked by Prolific London to be in the top 5 most valuable London based gaming startup.
At the core of their business is their patented technology that makes it possible to add, modify or remove features in compiled games to make them compatible with the requirements of any store without source code change. The technology does not require game developers to do any redevelopment work and does not require access to the game’s source code. It can enhance existing applications by adding features and functionality, such as gifting, in-app billing and several other solutions, primarily to drive revenue and user engagement.
As a Java Developer at our partner you will be part of thier highly efficient and collaborative Agile teams where you will be designing, building and maintaining features that replace some of their existing functionalities with state of the art technologies and add new business features. As part of the role you will have the opportunity to deep dive into the core of the Android platform and their billing services.
Key Activities:
Design and build the next iteration of the state of the art their software;Cooperate with other cross-functional teams to define and design platform improvement components and core features of their platform;Work with external data sources and APIs provided by companies like PayPal, Samsung and Amazon;Test your code (unit test, feature test) for robustness, including edge cases, usability, performance and reliability;Create highly scalable software solutions for serving tens of millions daily request to the platform
                Elvárások / Requirements
Technical skills:
2+ years experience as a Java Developer;Core Java and unit testing knowledge;Agile experience;Good SQL knowledge, preferably MySQL;A good understanding of HTTP protocol;Few years of work experience in related areas
Soft Skills:
Passion for technology, preferably within mobile space;Critical mindset and strong problem-solving ability;Enthusiastic and optimistic mindset;Strong ability and willingness to learn;Good communication skills, both verbal and written;Good interpersonal and team work skills;A passion for delivering high quality solutions
Education:
Educated to degree level in computer science or related discipline, or relevant experience in the field
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Eligibility for share option packageCompany mobile phoneTrainingsCompany eventsCompetitive salary
Java Developer

IT officer 
Szeretnél egy nemzetközi csapat részese lennél? Fontos számodra a fenntartható fejlesztés és a bolygónk?
Akkor a legjobb helyen jársz!
Jelentkezz partnerünkhöz, akik kulcsfontosságú technológiákat kínál, amelyek segítenek a tisztább bolygó megteremtésében.
Most Rendszergazdát keresünk partnerünkhöz, hogy a fenntartható jövő ne csak egy álom legyen.
Ha szeretnél részese lenni ennek a missziónak jelentkezz még MA!
 Feladatok
 A vállalat hálózati infrastruktúrájának level 1-2 szintű támogatása, valamint hatékony végfelhasználói támogatás az alkalmazásokban és hardverekben
 Műszaki tanácsadóként tevékenykedik minden számítógéppel kapcsolatos kérdésben és irányítja az informatikai megoldások megvalósítását
 Vészhelyzeti támogatást nyújt, ahol ez lehetséges, részlegi erőforrások vagy harmadik fél által biztosított erőforrások felhasználásával
 A rendszertervezés, -szervezés és a releváns informatikai rendszerek fejlesztésének koordinálása
 Az összes számítógép-vásárlás ellenőrzése és monitorozása, biztosítva a kompatibilitást a meglévő rendszerekkel a költségvetési korlátoknak megfelelően 
 Hatékony kommunikáció és kapcsolattartás az összes részleggel informatikai kérdésekben és kapcsolattartás harmadik felekkel és törvényes szervekkel 
 Koordinálja és segíti a végfelhasználók képzési és fejlesztési követelményeit
 Biztosítsa a rendszer- és adatbiztonságot megfelelő biztosítékok és eljárások bevezetésével, fenntartásával és felülvizsgálatával
 Biztosítsa, hogy az informatikai eszközök használata betartja al l vonatkozó szabványok és jogi követelmények
 Az oldal informatikai projektjeivel kapcsolatos munka más oldalakon folyó projektekhez is segítséget nyújt

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Ha van tapasztalatod IT üzemeltetésben, úgy érzed megállnád a helyed a kritikus rendszerek működtetésében, profin koordinálnád azokat, és biztos támogatója lennél a partnercégünk infrastruktúrájának, akkor jelentkezz Rendszeradminisztrátori pozíciónkba.
Partnerünk a minőségi utasélményt új szintre emeléséért dolgozik. Budapesti lokációjú csapatukba keresünk új kollégát. 
Feladatok:
Partnercégünk IT osztályának kezelésében lévő adathálózat és kommunikációs infrastruktúra 2. szintű, és bizonyos esetekben 3. szintű támogatási szolgáltatásának biztosítása.
Az ISO20000 alapú „Problem Management” és „Change Management” folyamataival összhangban a problémákhoz és a karbantartásokhoz, rendszer változásokhoz tartozó esetek és jegyek kezelése és dokumentálása.
Szakmai kapcsolattartás az informatikai beszállítókkal és a 3. szintű támogatói csoportokkal. Kapcsolattartás a kulcsfelhasználókkal.
Rendszer tesztelések – infrastruktúra és felhasználói -, leszervezése, támogatása és dokumentálása.
                Elvárások / Requirements
Elvárások:
Rendelkezz középfokú végzettséggel informatikai vagy villamosmérnök területen
Minimum 1 év releváns üzemeltetési tapasztalat
Alapszintű MS Windows és Linux szerver üzemeltetési ismeretek
Középfokon tudj kommunikálni angolul szóban és írásban
“B” kategóriás jogosítványodat gyakorlatban is tudd használni
Nyitottan állj egy-egy új helyzet megoldásához, ügyesen szervezz folyamatokat
Kommunikálj hatékonyan és barátságosan
Légy önálló, és talpraesett, de ha szükséges, merj támaszkodni a csapatra
Előnyök:
Felsőfokú végzettség informatikai vagy villamosmérnök területen
TCP/IP hálózati ismeretek (például CCNA ismerettel egyenértékű tudás)
haladó szintű Linux szerver üzemeltetési ismeretek
hyper-converged infrastructure ismeretek (Vmware vCenter és vSAN ismeretek)
kritikus, 7x24 órás rendszerek üzemeltetési tapasztalat
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Stabil, hosszú távú munkalehetőség

Hosszú távú fejlődési lehetőség

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Business Service Center is a German family-owned automotive company, and they would like to represent themselves also in the Hungarian market. They are planning to hire 350 new employees, and they will have a brand new office in Budapest. New colleagues will have a chance to join a new company and to make decisions on professional topics. These employees who add their own ideas would be prioritized by the management of the company. Fluent English is necessary to use for everyday work.
As an IT specialist various enhancements and optimizations will be customized in SAP WM/M to support our logistics departments in their daily work. The main focus of this position is the interface to our automatic warehouses and the setup and optimization of these processes as well.
Main tasks, roles, and responsibilities:
Detailing the solution design in close cooperation with our logistics solution architects
Customizing in SAP to fulfill business requirements
Contact to the business for automatic warehouses
Steering of external consultants
Creation of programming requests for our internal development team or for external programmers
Testing
Special Tasks/Key challenges:
Support of processes in the area of automatic warehouses and the interface to SAP ERP
Participation in the S/4 rollout
                Elvárások / Requirements
University degree with a focus on IT or similar qualification/training
3 or more years of experience
Experienced working in an international, virtual team
Deep SAP knowledge in the area of SAP-WM/IM and in the surrounding SAP modules
Knowledge about automatic warehouses and interface technology via IDOCs
Good English skills (spoken and written)
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Professional development opportunities
Competitive salary
Dynamic atmosphere
Home-office possibility
IT Expert SAP WM/IM and warehousing

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. They are looking for a new senior colleague to join their team in the following position:
IT ARCHITECT
Your focus will be:
Architectural design for industry 4.0 solutions using domain-driven design and microservice architecture patterns
Design and development of a computer vision/AI solution framework - including machine learning, backend and frontend development, corresponding DevOps and automation tasks
Design of technical solution architectures based on Microsoft Azure services, Databricks, .NET / C#, Angular, Kubernetes and Terraform
Working together with other professionals like product owners, business experts, solution architects and the development team to engineer solutions aligned with architecture guidelines.
Documentation and presenting results to the program leadership and stakeholders
Steering of the development team, orchestration of activities during the sprint and assurance of quality of results
                Elvárások / Requirements
Requirements you should fulfill:
At least a Bachelor's degree (Master's preferred) in IT
At least 3 years of experience in a similar position (Lead software developer, IT Architect etc.)
Some experience in agile software development
Practical experience with Azure, DevOps, .NET, Angular, Kubernetes and Terraform
Familiarity with the fundamentals of Data Science, Machine Learning, AI, and MLOps
A good understanding of low-level communication protocols.
Excellent verbal and written English language skills (German is a plus)
Soft skills we look for:
Team player attitude 
A result-oriented and systematic work approach
Excellent conceptual skills and an ability to structure complex topics
Autonomous, self-driven, flexible, reliable, and keen to push things forward

Pozíció leírása / Job description
As an internationally positioned IT team, we support the Client's product development by providing applications and solutions for mechanical and software development and for the management of development data. In this processes, we count more than 6,000 users among our internal customers.
We operate in a very heterogeneous environment of applications, such as CATIA Mechanical Design, MS Project Server, JIRA, GIT Software Management, Doors NG Requirements Management and our PLM system CIM Database.
To strengthen our team we are looking for a qualified and motivated IT specialist at our location in Budapest.
We offer an exciting work environment in a globally operating enterprise with many various opportunities for your own personal professional growth.
Focus is the software technical implementation of requirements demanded by our business partners in the engineering departments, mainly in Python programming language and in the context of our PLM System CIM Database
Developments of add-ons and interfaces to automate and optimize business processes.
Configuration of the engineering applications according to the business needs.
Operation, installation, configuration and incident handling in the environment of engineering applications.
Monitoring the service quality and ensuring optimal quality and availability of the application environment.
Communication and close collaboration with our other IT technical teams

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Ki a Megbízónk?
Magyarország piacvezető humánügyviteli szolgáltatója, több ezer ügyfél használja az ő megoldásaikat. Sikerük jelentős része a Kutatás és Fejlesztés területhez köthető, náluk születik a jövő, az újdonságokat ők hozzák létre! Jelenleg termékeik nemzetközi piacra való felkészítésén dolgoznak. A hazai piacon bevált megoldásaik megfelelő alapot képeznek egy nemzetközileg is sikeres szerepléshez. 
Hozzájuk keresünk most proaktív kollégát az alábbi pozíció betöltésére:
FULLSTACK FEJLESZTŐ
Most te is csatlakozhatsz hozzájuk, részese lehetsz sikereiknek! Megoldásaik az innovatív tudást és a korszerű technológiát ötvözik. Az elmúlt évben teljesen új technológiai alapokra helyezték a front- és back end oldalt, annak érdekében, hogy tudásukat, kreativitásukat a folyamatosan változó, kihívásokkal teli üzleti igények megoldására fordíthassák.
Mi lenne a Te feladatod? 
Üzleti és fejlesztői oktatással indítunk, amely megalapozza nálunk a karriered
Ezt követően 2-4 fős csapatokban fogsz dolgozni, a kliens oldalon
A termékeink technológiai frissítésébe fogsz bekapcsolódni
Díjazzuk, ha az általad megírt kód helyes működésének ellenőrzését automata tesztekkel is támogatod
                Elvárások / Requirements
Sikeres leszel náluk, ha:
Legalább 3 év szakmai tapasztalatod van releváns területen
Dolgoztál már Angular keretrendszerben
Rendelkezel .NET-es tapasztalattal
Ismered a TypeScript-et
Használtál már valamilyen ORM-et, illetve IoC Containert
Vannak saját ötleteid, és azokat ki is mered fejezni, illetve megvédeni
Az alábbi technológiák közül előnyt jelent, ha ismersz néhányat, de nem elvárás:
ASP.net MVC
WebApi
OData
Autofac
NHibernate
SignalR
FluentValidation
EPPlus
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Mit kínál Partnerünk?
Élményt, szakmai fejlődési lehetőséget, kiszámítható jövőt, piacképes juttatást.
Kreatív tevékenységre alkalmas munkakörülményeket („A” kategóriás irodaház, nagy személyes tér, zöld erkélyek)!
Irodaházuk könnyen megközelíthető tömegközlekedéssel és autóval.
Miért jó náluk dolgozni?
Rugalmas munkaidő
Kihívásokkal teli feladatok
Jókedvű, kommunikálni szerető csapat
Pihenőszoba, csocsó
Évente megrendezett családi nap
Fullstack fejlesztő (Angular & .NET)

Ki a Partnerünk, aki hirdet?
Mint független informatikai tanácsadó és szolgáltató cég, támogatják nemzetközi ügyfeleiket, rugalmas és innovatív, személyre szabott informatikai megoldásokkal. Fő hangsúly a pénzügyi és energiaszolgáltatókra, az ipari cégekre, a média és telekommunikációs vállalatokra tevődik. Jelenleg hét európai országban vannak jelen, szakmai érdemeik és folyamatos növekedésük több mint 500 munkatársuk kiváló teljesítményének köszönhető.

SZOFTVERTESZTELŐ MÉRNÖK - BEÁGYAZOTT RENDSZEREK

Lehetőséged nyílik nemzetközi projektekben való részvételre, akár külföldi helyszíneken

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our international client is looking for a motivated and dynamic DevOps Lead to join their team.
Our partner is a strategic supplier to all restaurants, deploying in over 120 countries and over 37,500 locations worldwide. They provide software development, testing, deployment and support services for POS (point-of-sale) and related software applications that focus on the overall crew and customer experience, resulting in improved operations in the restaurants.
The DevOps lead will be responsible for leading and guiding a team of devops engineers across IST, HU and CST timezones
They must have proven leadership experience and be able to coach and grow their team whilst also being hands on and able to troubleshoot issues, unblock the team andthink about long term vision of the area/what needs to be improved
                Elvárások / Requirements
This role is a leadership role but also hands on - both are required
Must be an expert/have proven high level experience in AWS and all respective components
Must have proven experience and high expertise in terraform and using AWS as a cloud provider. IAC is a must
Strong knowledge in containers and container orchestration. Must be very strong in Kubernetes
Very strong understanding of CI/CD, ideally Jenkins as a tool of choice
Skilled in one or more programming languages such as Python, Ruby etc
Understanding of Java preferable but not mandatory
Thorough understanding of source control, git and trunk based dev
Experience in monitoring and dashboards, ideally new relic
Working knowledge of consul and Vault
Leadership/Softskills:
Able to lead, coach and mentor engineers of various levels of ability
Be comfortable presenting and teaching
Must be able to think about the bigger picture and create a roadmap/vision forimproving the area
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
International team made of young and dynamic people, who like to keep work-life balance in mind
Remote work opportunity with only a few days a month in the office
Trainings, conferences, language courses, and sport opportunities
DevOps Lead

Jelentkezem
ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Test Engineer (Jira) 
A thyssenkrupp egy nemzetközi vállalatcsoport, amely nagyrészt független ipari és technológiai üzletágakból tevődik össze, és világszerte 96 000 embert foglalkoztat. A 2021/22-es pénzügyi évben 48 országban 41 milliárd eurós árbevételt ért el. A széleskörű technológiai know-how-ra támaszkodva az üzletágak költséghatékony és erőforrás-kímélő megoldásokat fejlesztenek a jövő kihívásaira, különösen az éghajlatvédelem, az energetikai transzformáció, az ipar digitális átalakulása és a jövő mobilitása terén.
Magyarországi kompetencia központunkban közel 1000 fős mérnökcsapatunkkal innovatív partnerként vagyunk jelen az autóipar egyik leggyorsabban és legizgalmasabban fejlődő szegmensében, az elektromechanikus kormányrendszerek területén. Kiemelkedő minőségű, high-tech fejlesztéseinkkel neves autógyárak igényeit elégítjük ki, fejlesztéseink pedig a világszerte autóba szerelt kormányrendszerek 25 százalékában megtalálhatóak. Mérnökeink olyan ma még nem létező megoldásokon is dolgoznak, amelyek megváltoztathatják az autóipar jövőjét.
 Tasks / Feladatok
Tool-fejlesztő csapatunkba keresünk Test Engineer kollégát manuális- és automatizált tesztelési területre! A csapat új alapokra helyezte a JIRA-t, mint project management eszközt. Ehhez a szoftverhez fejlesztünk plugin-t a beérkező igények alapján. Csapaton belül nagy hangsúlyt helyezünk a kreatív problémamegoldásra, közös gondolkodásra a beérkező igények megvalósításának módjáról. Ha csatlakozol hozzánk, egy összetartó csapat részeseként felelnél a projekt tesztelési tevékenységeiért, ami magában foglalja a manuális és az automatizált tesztelési területeket is.
Feladatok:
Tesztesetek írása és karbantartása fejlesztési specifikáció és dokumentáció alapján
Egyedi fejlesztések funkcionális tesztelése manuálisan
Backend és frontend funkciók tesztautomatizációja
Tesztek kiértékelése, bugok jelentése, javítások validálása dokumentációja
Teszt-lefedettség nyomonkövetése
Terheléses és teljesítmény-tesztek írása, futtatása és kiértékelése
 Requirements / Elvárások
Felsőfokú végzettség IT területen
Legalább 2 év tapasztalat tesztautomatizálásban, vagy manuális tesztelésben és programozásban

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Are you passionate about software and about aviation? Do you love a technical challenge and like to work on multiple platforms to create a consistent experience for the consumers?
Our partner company has 30.000 employees worldwide. The company has a head office in Paris and Amsterdam and has several daughter companies. The group has over 550 aircraft and they are one of the bigger players in Europe. The developers they are hiring now will be working from Budapest, but fully part of the product teams.
The company has gone through a major restructuring over the last two years to adjust to the covid crisis. They are now implementing a strategic restructuring program in which one of the pillars is the Data & Technology track. They have expressed the ambition to become the most data and tech-driven accompany in their sector. To do this, they are innovating and expanding and thus looking to attract more experts to the company.
Specify, design, engineer, test, deliver, deploy, maintain and support digital products in order to optimally enable the improvement of business processes.
As a software developer, you now have the opportunity to join a new team in our partner company. However, there is already a team of developers working on the airline's internal applications in Amsterdam they are looking to involve those who join the new team in the development of new applications.
Our partner company is looking for an agile & objective-minded experienced developer with a pro-active mindset that is eager to learn new things.
                Elvárások / Requirements
3+ years of experience in Java;Agile Project Management tool such as Jira or GitLab;Git and Online versioning tool such as Bitbucket or GitHub;CI/CD experience;Spring Boot;Relational databases such as PostgreSQL and Oracle
Preferred:
Docker, Kubernetes;Microsoft Azure;Redis
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Long-term opportunity within a fast growing companyCareer development opportunitiesSupportive cultureCompetitive benefits package, cafeteria
Software Engineer

At Diehl: The future is in your hands!

At Diehl Aviation, an efficient and dedicated network of aviation experts constantly develops and produces the state of the art in avionics systems, cabin elements and cabin lighting – from high-quality composite components, cabin fittings and electronics in commercial aircraft to highly integrated bathrooms and galleys. Apply at Diehl and join hands with fascinating technologies and a unique corporate tradition of stability and trust.
Engineering Support (Debrecen)

Adatvédelmi Szakértő

Nagymértékben támogatjuk munkatársaink fejlődését: változatos feladatokkal, több szervezeti egységet is érintő projektekkel, állandó képzésekkel.
Egymást segítve közösen oldjuk meg a feladatokat, mert nálunk hagyomány, hogy „Kell egy csapat”! A jövőnk Benned van!

 az alábbi pozícióba:
Pozíció leírása:
Programok előállítása, fejlesztése, optimalizálása a berendezés(ek)hez
A dedikált berendezés programjainak karbantartása
SW-es hibaelhárítás és ciklusidő csökkentése
Gyártásindítás, próba-és prototípusgyártás végrehajtása, a riportáláshoz szükséges információk biztosítása
Együttműködés az új gyártásitechnikák-és technológiák bevezetésében
A közvetett és közvetlen vevői követelmények bevezetése
Projektek bevezetése, az eszközök és berendezések beszerzésének koordinálásában történő részvétel
Új termékek, termékcsoportok, valamint folyamatok bevezetése a termelésbe
Gyártási dokumentációk elkészítése és karbantartása
Mintagyártások végrehajtása, új gyártási technikák átvétele és bevezetése.
Hire-One Személyzeti Tanácsadó Kft. Nyilvántartási szám: 3376-1/2008.
Elvárások: Közép- vagy felsőfokú végzettség (Villamosmérnök / Műszaki Informatikus / Mechatronikai mérnök);
Gyártó vállalatnál szerzett szakmai tapasztalat;
Angol nyelv kommunikáció szintű ismerete;
Adatbázisok készség szintű ismerete;
Industry 4.0 szemléletmód;
Programnyelv ismerete, pl.: C#/Java/Visual basic.
Amit nyújtunk: Albérleti támogatás (költözős pályázók esetén);
Bejárás támogatása;
Cafeteria;
Home office;
Nemzetközi csapat tagjaként együttműködés a világ legnagyobb autógyártóival;
Versenyképes juttatási csomag;
Karrier és fejlődési lehetőségek;
Folyamatos szakmai tréningek.
Előnyök: Elektronikai gyártó cégnél szerzett tapasztalat.  Rugalmas;
Kreatív gondolkodásmódú;
Önálló munkavégzésre képes és hajlandó.

Microsoft Rendszergazda
Szakmai elvárások:
Microsoft termékek és megoldások ismerete

tapasztalat informatikai rendszerek üzemeltetése, támogatása, hibaelhárítása terén
informatikai projektek végrehajtásában, tervdokumentációk készítésében való jártasság
ügyfelek felhasználóinak IT támogatása, problémák, hibák elhárítása

az alábbi pozícióba:
Pozíció leírása:
A leendő kolléga Partnerünk gyárában biztosítja a megfelelő kiber-biztonsági szintet és amennyiben probléma lép fel, gondoskodik a megoldásról és megelőzésről
Fejleszti a gyárban dolgozó kollégák gondolkodásmódját, hogy mire figyeljenek IT biztonsági szempontból
Felügyeli a szabványok, szabályok kiber-biztonsági betartását
Kezeli és biztosítja a vállalat webes felületeinek kiber-biztonsági szintjét
IT biztonsági auditokat tervez és végrehajt, együttműködve külső szolgáltatókkal
Fejleszti és telepíti az új IT biztonsági eszközöket
A regionális szakmai vezetőnek fog jelenteni (angol nyelven).
Hire-One Személyzeti Tanácsadó Kft. Nyilvántartási szám: 3376-1/2008.
Elvárások: Informatikai végzettség;
3 év kiber-biztonsági tapasztalat;
Aktív angol nyelvtudás.
Amit nyújtunk: Versenyképes kompenzációs és juttatási csomag (teljesítményprémium, étkezési pótlék, ingázási támogatás, bejárás támogatás iskolakezdési támogatás, szemüveg kedvezmény)
13. havi fizetés
Sportolási és szabadidős tevékenységi támogatás
Home office lehetősége;
A túlóra értékelése és kifizetése (ha van esetleg).

Site Cybersecurity Officer - Veszprém 
Munkavégzés helye: 
Veszprém
            Pozíció területei: 
IT: IT állások
RESPONSIBILITIES:
Coordinate the different actors of the site for all Cybersecurity topics
Raise any non-compliance, abnormal Cybersecurity event, and Cybersecurity incident
Manage locally the Cybersecurity events and incidents
Provide the reporting of the site to the Regional Cybersecurity Officer
Contribute to develop the Cybersecurity mindset within the site
Control that the Group Cybersecurity standards, rules and best practices
Manage and provide the Cybersecurity KPIs of the site
Analyze and consult all IT-Security matters to the management and the users within the site as main contact person.
Planning and Performing of IT Security Audits, in cooperation with internal and external service providers
Planning and Execution of IT-Security Projects as Project Manager and Expert in cooperation with the Site IS Manager
Installation and development of IT security tools and standards
Verification of the Business Continuity Process, Review and Update Process
REQUIREMENTS:
Graduate in Computer Science
3 years experience in Cybersecurity
Result orientation attitude
Knowledge of English
Information Technology competences
Analytical skills
Problem-solving skills
IT Security background and knowledge
Knowledge in security standards (e.g. BSI, NIST, ISO 27001, TISAX), as well as data protection
ADVANTAGE:
French/ German knowledge
Security certificates (e.g. Security+, CEH, CISSP or similar)

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our international client is looking for an experienced test automation engineer for their team based in Budapest. By joining the team, you'll be involved in the development and testing of one of their products, which optimizes the daily utilization of flights, increases user productivity and improves airline management when there are deviations from the regular schedule.
Our new test engineer's focus will be:
Creating automated tests on all levels of the testing pyramid
Working together with a cross-functional team to implement test development
Understanding and validating requirements from a testing perspective
Contributing creative ideas to help evolve our testing methodologies
Occasionally mentoring colleagues with less experience
                Elvárások / Requirements
The requirements you should fulfill:
3+ years of experience in test automation (or software development with a focus on QA)
Excellent English knowledge (spoken and written)
Knowledge of Java and JavaScript/TypeScript
Experience with browser-based automation tools
Experience in API testing
Familiarity with agile practises and CI/CD
Familiarity with version control (preferably Git) and issue tracking systems (preferably Jira)
It's an advantage if you also have:
Familiarity with Docker and Kubernetes
Experience in SQL/NoSQL databases, cloud (preferably Azure or GCP), Linux/Unix
University degree in Computer Science
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
What our partner offers:
Flexible working hours, remote work opportunity
Training opportunities for professional and soft skills
Supportive, professional and multinational team
Discount on company flights
Agile (scrum) environment
Working part-time is also possible
Test Automation Engineer

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Client is one of the leading investment banks in the world, and for their growing professional team we are looking for a Vulnerability Reporting Analyst.
Maintain oversight of all infrastructure hygiene, vulnerability reporting, and GEM reporting.
Work with vulnerability lifecycle managers, operations and application support teams, and the vulnerability data team to analyze requirements, design and develop specs and manage data which supplies information to all vulnerability threat reporting and analysis.
Create ad-hoc reports for additional management or audit related requests.
Work with partnering organizations to automate manual metrics and reporting.
Support the GEM Operations Lead with ad-hoc requests.
                Elvárások / Requirements
3+ years in vulnerability management or information security reporting functions
Strong communication skills.
Excellent attention to detail.
Familiarity with:
Vulnerability Assessment tools, e.g., Nessus, Qualys, etc.
OS Security, e.g., Unix, Linux, Windows, Cisco, etc.
Web application infrastructure, e.g., Application Servers, Web Servers, Databases
Web development and programming languages i.e., Python, Perl, Ruby, Java, and/or .Net
Business Intelligence tools
SQL scripting and advanced Excel skills
Strong work ethic and a proactive mindset with ability to think “outside of the box” to solve problems.
Experience solving complex data flow challenges.
Advanced knowledge of complex queries for data analysis.
Experience with at least one coding language (PowerShell, Python, C#, etc.).
Experience in automation and optimization of repetitive processes and reporting.
Education:
Bachelor’s degree/University degree or equivalent experience
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits

Private Medical Care Program and onsite medical rooms in our buildings
Pension Plan Contribution to Voluntary Pension Fund
Group Life Insurance
Flexible work arrangements
Continuous career progression opportunities across geographies and business line
An inclusive and friendly corporate culture with diverse networking opportunities

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Client is one of the leading investment banks in the world, and for their growing professional team we are looking for an Information Security Program Analyst.
Governance of Application System Testing standards and policies - review the standards andmake enhancements based on application assets
Identify compliance objectives and map program deliverables to the requirements
Document scope of assets to be included in the system security testing standard forvulnerability assessments
Collaborate with business and enterprise architecture team to implement changes required toidentify assets for vulnerability assessments scoping
Document business requirements related to system enhancements and submit for reviewsand approvals
Map out process flows for controls in systems and review for improvements to make controlsmore effective
Monitor vulnerability assessment exemption and exception requests and process based ondocumented system testing standards and policies
Collect information for generating and communicating responses for internal audit questions and deliverables promptly
Design and implement a solution for performance measurements on effectiveness of controlsand overall vulnerability assessment program
Analyze trends on assets security health posture and report using visualization tools forprogram review with management and stakeholders
Provide timely, accurate, and actionable reporting on application vulnerability activity, trends,service levels, and areas of concern to senior management
Document and standardize business rules for accurate compliance measurements andtracking metrics based on application security testing standard
Work with the Metrics reporting team to enhance and refine the metrics and keyperformance indicators reported to senior management and external regulatory agencies
Develop User acceptance test plans for testing changes to system enhancements that impactgovernance and compliance
Serve as a Program SME and drive open issues to a closure with appropriate resolution
Update power point presentations monthly and quarterly for application security programreviews
Train and mentor team members as needed
Weekly and Monthly Status reporting for the program
                Elvárások / Requirements
3+ years of experience in information security or related technology experience
Experience working in an information security team defining, revising and implementingcorporate information security policies
Experience analyzing security assessments and creating metrics visualizations for analytics
Experience reviewing application security testing results from various testing tools
Project Management experience a plus
Experience with governance and implementation of security policies, standards, procedures,programs, plans and processes
Experience coordinating initiatives related to process control design and testing
Professional Certifications in Information Security domain a plus
Demonstrate an aptitude to develop and implement application security strategies and plansbased on company standards
Familiarity with security standards such as OWASP, NIST, PCI DSS, etc.
Consistently demonstrates clear and concise written and verbal communication
Proven analytical, influencing and relationship management skills
Education:
Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Competitive compensation package with extensive benefits:
Private Medical Care Program and onsite medical rooms in our buildings
Pension Plan Contribution to Voluntary Pension Fund
Group Life Insurance
Flexible work arrangements
Continuous career progression opportunities across geographies and business line
An inclusive and friendly corporate culture with diverse networking opportunities

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our client is an international company in the automotive industry who are looking for a software development engineer who supports the integrate of safety technologies and controls vehicle dynamics to ensure safe and comfortable driving. The objective is to implement "Vision Zero", the vision of accident-free driving. Autonomous Mobility and Safety's components and system capabilities are prerequisites for autonomous mobility.
Software development of embedded and real-time safety system (ABS/ESC/Airbag/ADAS)
Analyzing internal and customer requirements
Develop new implementations according to software requirement specifications and relevant standards
Following and applying software development processes (AFLOW, ASPICE)
Develop component / module test-cases
Analyzing the root cause of the detected failures
Evaluating test results and resolve the found issues with the cooperation of an international project team
                Elvárások / Requirements
Bachelor or Master’s degree in any field of engineering or computer science
Good knowledge of C programming language
Good problem solving skills, practical thinking, engineering mindset
Confident English language skills
Ability to work in a team
Advantages:
Knowledge of programing languages like C++, C#, Python, Java, etc.
Experience in embedded programming
Practice in programming real-time systems
Knowledge of relevant automotive standards (ASPICE, IATF)
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
Flexible working time
Home office opportunity
Laptop and company mobile
Private health insurance
Cafeteria
Bonus system
Financial support of commuting costs/weekend travelling costs to permanent address
Financial support for families regarding school starting costs
Financial support for renting/buying a flat
Canteen and coffee bar
Company events
Parking space for cars and bikes
Coaching service
C Software Engineer

TESZTMÉRNÖK R&D MECHANICS 
A Knorr-Bremse Rail Systems Budapest hazánkban és a világon is vezető szerepet tölt be a vasúti fékrendszerek területén. A mi fékünket használják a CAF villamosok és a csúcstechnológiás japán Shinkansen nagysebességű vasút is. Kiemelkedünk a magyarországi gépipari vállalatok közül azzal, hogy nálunk a teljes gyártási folyamat megtalálható, a kutatás-fejlesztéstől a szoftveres vezérlésen át a megvalósításig. Ha fontos számodra, hogy egy stabil, ugyanakkor modern és nemzetközi cégnél dolgozz, jelentkezz vállalatunkhoz! Jelenleg lelkes és fejlődni vágyó munkatársakat keresünk bővülés miatt Levegőellátás területünkre Tesztmérnök R&D Mechanics pozícióba! 
EZEK LESZNEK A FELADATAID
A levegőellátás, kutatás-fejlesztési osztály tesztmérnök csapatában a vasúti légellátó rendszerek és komponenseinek (kompresszor, légszárító) vizsgálata innovációs, költségcsökkentési vagy belső fejlesztési projektekben
A megrendelővel történő tesztkövetelmény egyeztetésétől kezdve, a validációs tervek elkészítésén át a projekt véghezviteléig számos feladatban kipróbálhatod magadat, hiszen itt önálló projektek is vannak egyéni felelősségi körrel
A feladataidhoz tartozik a tesztfelépítés, környezet és mérőrendszer tervezése és felépítése, hogy aztán a saját tesztinfrastruktúránkban az egyeztetett validációs terv alapján elvégezhesd a funkció- vagy élettartamteszteket.
A különböző hosszúságú projektek során folyamatosan monitorozni szükséges a futó teszteket, egyeztetni a köztes eredményeket, kezelni a váratlan eseményeket.
A fejlesztési folyamat támogatása mérési eredményekkel, illetve tapasztalatokkal hiszen saját laboratóriumban elsőkézből tesztelheted a prototípus alkatrészeket is.
A műszeres mérések végrehajtását és az eredmények kiértékelését követően a dokumentációt el kell készítened, melyet később prezentálnod is kell
Folyamatos kapcsolattartás folyik mind külső, mind belső szolgáltató felekkel

Döntéshozatali és felelősségvállalási képességtől sem riadsz meg 
Pontosság, alaposság, proaktivitás jellemez 
Lelkiismeretes és megbízható, eredmény- és megoldás orientált hozzáállású vagy

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Experienced Migration Specialist 
Description
Tasks:
• Strong understanding across VMware infrastructure components (server, storage, network, data, and applications) to deliver end to end Cloud Infrastructure engagements that includes assessment and migrations.
	• Good experience in lift and shift migrations with various source environment like VMware, Hyper-V, Physical servers and Other Clouds
	• Good experience to Migration tools VMware HCX (Installation, configurations and troubleshooting install & config issues)
	• Working experience to other Migration tools like Rivermeadow, Platespin, Zerto, Carbonite Migrate (Good to have)
	• Design, develop and architect application platforms on Azure (Good to have not a must requirement)
	• Working experience on database migrations SQL and Oracle
Qualifications
• Understanding Fundamentals of firewalls and ports
	• Hands on experience in VMware networking (VSS,VDS,Portgroups,VLAN Taging) and Network Migration from Fortigate to NSX-T (Good to have)
	• Hands on experience in VMware NSX (edge gw, Provider gw, LDR, Logical Switches, OSPF/BGP) (Good to have)
	• Strong Knowledge in Discovery, Assessment, Migration (Agentless/Agent based)
	• Good knowledge in Datacenter services
	• Infrastructure Architecture including Active Directory, Backup Networking, Compute, Capacity Planning
	• Should have experience in Transitioning Projects to cloud.
	• Experience in handling Critical Migration projects and handling Migration Team

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
C  / QT Engineer 
About the Role
We’re looking for experienced engineers to participate in automotive infotainment system (head-unit) HMI development for one of largest European car manufacturer. Infotainment system is an embedded device that implements digital instrument cluster, central touchscreen, heads-up display (HUD) etc.
Main tasks for such engineer will be to implement the Digital Cluster UI, using Qt/QML and Qt Design Studio tool, UI optimization on the target, etc.
Such engineers could as well be invited to participate in HMI competence development activities, such as doing research of competitive products and solutions related to HMI development, doing prototyping and PoCs, writing white papers, etc
Your Team
You will become a part of a large Automotive team and join one of key international automotive projects with personnel in EMEA/APAC. The project is responsible for infotainment system software development and maintenance, and the team is responsible for HMI part of that. HMI team contains of 10+ engineers working with Qt/QML-based 3D HMI and Qt Design Studio UI. 
What You Will Do
You would be asked to participate as a senior Qt developer in Cluster HMI SCRUM team, focused on development HMI functionality and HMI skinning for Digital Instrument Cluster and HUD for different car brands. 
Our project and teams are using Agile process to interact with customer and CI to build software. Your main responsibilities:
Development of state-of-the-art HMI UI using Qt/QML
Handle defects backlog in the dedicated area

Code reviews 
Mentoring of new engineers

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Java Team Leader 
Your new company
KLM Royal Dutch Airlines is a leading European airline. KLM IT is a strong mature agile organization with over 1.000 internal employees worldwide – but they are starting fresh in Budapest with a new start-up this year.
Together they fly 110 aircraft to 145 destinations, bringing millions of passengers to where they need to be, developing sustainable travel and pushing the boundaries of air travel towards to the future. Welcome aboard flight KL1977, made possible in part by you, the software engineering leader.
KLM has set the goal of becoming the most data and technology-driven airline in the world. Changing their way of working, modernizing their technology landscape and architecture and the right positioning of the employees in this Data & Technology organization is essential to realize this ambition.
Four business platforms have been implemented so far: Flight, People, Technology & Intelligence (Human Resources), Ground and Integral Planning & Control. Business Flight will be the platform where you land!
Your new role
Very briefly, you will be working on some of KLM's core systems that support their flying crew members. From systems that enable planning and rostering of their crew to ensuring the right catering is placed onboard every flight, the 3 domains within Flight have a very diverse application landscape. Through your work, you will have a direct impact on their crew, aircrafts and customers.
In addition:
You will supervise a number of software engineers
You will be the link between your department and the rest of the business
You will be part of the tech management and you will give direction to technical solutions
You will work with different programming tools
What you'll need to succeed
You love complex problems and enjoy solving them even more. You are not afraid of change. In fact, you want to constantly improve their services. You speak various programming languages, but also enjoy coaching and guiding software engineers. Your will be working in an environment that at this moment also relies on planning & rostering systems or SAP (catering), knowledge on integrating COTS in custom applications and experience with DevOps is a pre.
A college or university degree, preferably in IT or engineering
Good knowledge of the English language
A strong knowledge of different programming languages
Java
TypeScript
Preferred but not necessary, secondary experience in
Front end (Angular)
DevOps
More than 7 years of proven experience in software development
What you'll get in return
A challenging role at a unique European company
10% of your work time dedicated to personal development and a personal learning budget
10% bonus depending on individual as well as the company performance
Great flexible benefits such as: nursery, health care, pension, parking, SZEP card, etc.
Attractive discounts on airline tickets (after 6 months of service) with KLM and their partners
A personal budget for sustainable employability
What you need to do now
If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now.
If this job isn't quite right for you but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.
Jelentkezem

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our global Client is looking for their new Java Developer colleague who can take part in designing common modules for various products which provide optimal support for airlines! 
By joining one of their teams you will have a possibility to use a wide range of Java technologies and to work together with German and Hungarian teams.
You will be responsible for:
Designing, implementing and testing new functionalitiesMaintain the current systemKeeping contact and cooperating with teams located in Hungary and in Germany, ensure smooth and active communication with co-workers and associated partners
You will deal with the following technologies, tools and frameworks:
Java Spring framework (Spring Boot, Spring Data, Spring Security, Spring Integration, Spring Cloud)RESTful servicesMicroservicesOracle, PostgreSQL, SQLHibernateMaven, GitJira, ConfluenceDocker
                Elvárások / Requirements
You will be successful if you have:
Practical experience in design and development in Java applications (at least 3 years)Good Object Oriented Programming and Design skillsGood knowledge of English both spoken and writtenStrong analytical and problem solving skillsHave professional experience in working with the technology stackLike working on projects with high responsibilityHave solution-focused approach
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
What are the benefits of joining Our Partner as an employee?
Even when you work hard, you will still have time for your personal life: their flexible working hours based on core time, the exact observance of the designated number of working hours and the benefits that can be extended to cover your family you can also improve your non-working life!
They have long-term plans for you! They have carefully designed career paths (and a career management system), they provide the appropriate training courses and projects to accomplish your aims.
Their community is characterized by mutual respect and an attitude of helpfulness. This high professional quality level and the colorful personalities will help you spend your everyday life in a good mood, why you make the best of your skills and talents.
In addition to an inclusive and helpful atmosphere, trust is also an important value for the company. You can rely on Our Partner with anything right from your first day.

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
SAP PP supporter 
thyssenkrupp is an international group of companies comprising largely independent industrial and technology businesses and employing 96,000 people. Across 48 countries it generated sales of €41 billion in fiscal year 2021/22. Backed by extensive technological know-how, the businesses develop cost-effective and resource-friendly solutions to the challenges of the future, especially in the fields of climate protection, the energy transition, digital transformation in the industry and mobility of the future.
In the Hungarian development center with our engineering team of 1000 we are present as an innovative and significant partner in one of the fastest growing and most exciting segment of the automotive industry, in the field of electromechanical steering systems. With outstanding quality and high-tech developments we meet the needs of renowned car manufacturers and our developments can be found in 25 % of the manufactured cars all over the world. Our engineers work on new challenges that can change the future of automotive.
 Tasks / Feladatok
SAP support of SAP R/3 and S/4 PP module
Support of Sedapta
Ticketing, contribution to projects
Specification of SAP, Sedapta and scanner developments
Testing and implementation of new features
User support and training
Business improvement in the field of PP (production and production planning)
Authorization management
 Requirements / Elvárások
3+ years of user and customizing experience with SAP PP
Experience in writing development specifications
Ability to understand ABAP code. Debugging or development skills is a plus
Good level of English
Willingness to travel (10%)
Personality:
Logical way of thinking
Ability to work independently
Effective communication
Advantages:
Good MM knowledge and/or experience with product cost collector is a plus
Sedapta knowledge
Experience with the connection of MES Systems and SAP ERP
EDI experience
German knowledge

You can be part of a successful and growing company in the field of technology
We support you with flexible working hours and home office opportunity (60 % of the working time in many of our positions)
Competitive salary and wide range of other benefits (cafeteria & bonus) are provided to you
You can learn new languages in small groups, selecting from 5 languages
We organize leisure time activities (board games, sport activities)

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Client is a leader in one of the fastest and biggest sectors of entertainment - mobile games. Their goal is to improve and change the mobile games industry forever. They help game developers and distribution channels generate more revenue from games by expanding their reach and distribution. 
You’ll be part of our efficient, technology obsessed, and collaborative Platform Engineering team where you will be designing, building and maintaining solutions that extend their AWS cloud-based platform with new features. As part of the role, you’ll have the opportunity to dive deep into all parts of their platform and participate in their journey to build a strong foundation for all of services and technology solutions.
We’re now looking for an enthusiastic and experienced individual to join their team in Budapest, Hungary. You’ll be part of a distributed remote team with a strong culture of openness, transparency, and kindness. You’ll have the opportunity to closely work with and learn from experienced senior team members on a daily basis. They’re a cross-functional team that combines areas of infrastructure Ops, DevOps, and full-stack Software Engineering.
Key activities
Research, design, build, improve, and automate the next iteration of the platform
Improve the developer experience of their product development teams by providing a streamlined set of tools, standards, and processes for application development, continuous integration, development environments
Build robust, scalable, easy-to-use and easy-to-understand platform solutions used by other software developers in their daily work
Implement performance improvements and optimizations of critical parts of their services
Take a key role in migrating remaining functionalities from monolithic application setup to microservices design and deployment
Create highly scalable software solutions for serving tens of millions daily request from across the whole world
                Elvárások / Requirements
Educated to degree level in computer science or related discipline, or relevant experience in the field
5+ years of experience in Ops/DevOps or software development
Ability to visit our office in Budapest on an ad-hoc/monthly/weekly basis
Professional working proficiency in English
Skills that drive success in this role:
Unix/Linux/Bash, setting up and managing virtual servers. Managing virtual servers and related virtual cloud infrastructure is at the core of what we do.
Docker, application containerization. A docker container is our standard unit of deployment.
Clean coding skills. We are always expanding the areas where we apply the “infrastructure as code” approach. We write new code and we carefully review the code of our colleagues, ranging from small infrastructure automation scripts, continuous integration support, to more complex backend code.
Kubernetes, Helm. We continue migrating more of our services into our cluster environment where deployment and other usual tasks are fully automated.
SQL, MySQL. We manage and provide various data storage services to other dev teams, SQL databases are one of the main technologies in this area.
Ability to decompose problems and changes into small incremental steps. We use agile approaches to software development, and platform is no exception. We aim to deliver changes and results in small and safe incremental changes.
A critical mindset and a strong problem-solving ability. We work with complex systems using complex technologies and we rarely see the same problem twice.
Balancing autonomous work with clear communication with peers. Every team member has the opportunity to fully own and drive their own projects, but we don’t work alone. Peers are always available to provide feedback and discuss possible approaches.
Additional skills useful in this role:
IaaS platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure, ...)
JUnit/TestNG
GitOps, CDK, EKS, Flux
CI/CD pipelines, Jenkins
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
A wide range of learning opportunities. They work in many different areas, and even their most senior members never stop learning new technologies and approaches. They learn from each other and they join courses online and on-site. Their team members have various certifications acquired through and funded by the company.
Support from a number of domain experts. Members of the team are experts in many different areas, so you will always have someone to turn to for help.
A clear set of priorities, plans, and strategies. You will always know how you can best contribute to the success of the team, the company, and their customers.
A culture of transparency and kindness. They are a diverse company and they openly discuss our views and value everyone’s opinion.
Company share options
Company phone, company laptop
Visits to our London headquarters
Team events, gatherings, conferences
Private Medical Insurance
Travel reimbursement
DevOps Engineer in Platform Engineering

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Client is a leader in one of the fastest and biggest sectors of entertainment - mobile games. Their goal is to improve and change the mobile games industry forever. They help game developers and distribution channels generate more revenue from games by expanding their reach and distribution. 
You’ll be part of our efficient, technology obsessed, and collaborative Platform Engineering team where you will be designing, building and maintaining solutions that extend our AWS cloud-based platform with new features. As part of the role, you’ll have the opportunity to dive deep into all parts of our platform and participate in our journey to build a strong foundation for all of services and technology solutions.
We’re now looking for an enthusiastic and experienced individual to join their team in Budapest, Hungary. You’ll be part of a distributed remote team with a strong culture of openness, transparency, and kindness. You’ll have the opportunity to closely work with and learn from experienced senior team members on a daily basis. They’re a cross-functional team that combines areas of backend Software Engineering and infrastructure Ops/DevOps.
Key activities
Research, design, build, improve, and automate the next iteration of the Flexion platform
Improve the developer experience of their product development teams by providing a streamlined set of tools, standards, and processes for application development, continuous integration, development environments
Build robust, scalable, easy-to-use and easy-to-understand platform solutions used by other software developers in their daily work
Implement performance improvements and optimizations of critical parts of their services
Take a key role in migrating remaining functionalities from monolithic application setup to microservices design and deployment
Create highly scalable software solutions for serving tens of millions daily request from across the whole world
                Elvárások / Requirements
Skills that drive success in this role
Java, clean coding skills. Some of our most impactful changes are done on the software backend side of the services that we run and we use Java even for the automation of our platform itself.
Spring Boot. We provide standardised service setup to other dev teams and this industry standard framework is an integral part of it.
Unix/Linux/Bash. Managing virtual servers and related virtual cloud infrastructure is at the core of what they do.
Docker, application containerization. A docker container is our standard unit of deployment.
SQL, MySQL. They manage and provide various data storage services to other dev teams, SQL databases are one of the main technologies in this area.
Kubernetes, Helm. They continue migrating more of their services into our cluster environment where deployment and other usual tasks are fully automated.
Ability to decompose problems and changes into small incremental steps. They use agile approaches to software development, and platform is no exception. They aim to deliver changes and results in small and safe incremental changes.
A critical mindset and a strong problem-solving ability. We work with complex systems using complex technologies and they rarely see the same problem twice.
Balancing autonomous work with clear communication with peers. Every team member has the opportunity to fully own and drive their own projects, but they don’t work alone. Peers are always available to provide feedback and discuss possible approaches.
Additional skills useful in this role
JUnit/TestNG
CI/CD pipelines, Jenkins, Git
GitOps (Flux)
IaaS platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure, ...)
Further requirements
Educated to degree level in computer science or related discipline, or relevant experience in the field
5+ years of experience in software development or Ops/DevOps
Ability to visit our office in Budapest on an ad-hoc/monthly/weekly basis
Professional working proficiency in English
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits
A wide range of learning opportunities. They work in many different areas, and even their most senior members never stop learning new technologies and approaches. They learn from each other and they join courses online and on-site. Their team members have various certifications acquired through and funded by the company.
Support from a number of domain experts. Members of the team are experts in many different areas, so you will always have someone to turn to for help.
A clear set of priorities, plans, and strategies. You will always know how you can best contribute to the success of the team, the company, and their customers.
A culture of transparency and kindness. They are a diverse company and they openly discuss our views and value everyone’s opinion.
Company share options
Company phone, company laptop
Visits to our London headquarters
Team events, gatherings, conferences
Private Medical Insurance
Travel reimbursement

Senior PLM / ALM Application Engineer 
thyssenkrupp is an international group of companies comprising largely independent industrial and technology businesses and employing 96,000 people. Across 48 countries it generated sales of €41 billion in fiscal year 2021/22. Backed by extensive technological know-how, the businesses develop cost-effective and resource-friendly solutions to the challenges of the future, especially in the fields of climate protection, the energy transition, digital transformation in the industry and mobility of the future.
In the Hungarian development center with our engineering team of 1000 we are present as an innovative and significant partner in one of the fastest growing and most exciting segment of the automotive industry, in the field of electromechanical steering systems. With outstanding quality and high-tech developments we meet the needs of renowned car manufacturers and our developments can be found in 25 % of the manufactured cars all over the world. Our engineers work on new challenges that can change the future of automotive.
 Tasks / Feladatok
The development of solutions for our future PLM / ALM landscape based on the Siemens PLM application suite is your primary goal. You will develop concepts and will be responsible for the technical realization. You will also consider migration aspects and take care of the integration in our existing IT infrastructure.
You will configure our PLM system landscape and adapt it from a technical perspective. Furthermore will you coordinate our external partners as part of the project activities. 
You will be responsible for the development of concepts and implementation of projects in the SLM context, including PLM, ALM, MBSE (Model Based System Engineering), Big Data and Advanced Analytics, working jointly with other departments.
You will always keep an eye on technological developments in order to be able to assess the beneficial use of digital technologies in the field of engineering applications.
 Requirements / Elvárások
BSc/MSc degree in IT or another relevant field
Expertise in Siemens Teamcenter or Siemens Polarion or similar (how to configure, adapt and operate)
Experience in automotive industry
Passion for new technologies and innovations in the PLM and ALM environment
Fluent English (both written and spoken)
Excellent problem solving skills
Friendly personality and good communication skills
Enjoy working in a team
"Can do" attitude
Willingness to travel (once or twice in a year to Eschen, Liechtenstein)
 Offer / Ajánlatunk
A modern office in the 11th district is waiting for you to support your creativity with fun community places, cafe rooms, an own cinema and a skybar
You can be part of a successful and growing company in the field of technology
We support you with flexible working hours and home office opportunity (60 % of the working time in many of our positions)
Competitive salary and wide range of other benefits (cafeteria & bonus) are provided to you
You can learn new languages in small groups, selecting from 5 languages
We organize leisure time activities (board games, sport activities)

Pozíció leírása / Job description
Ha van tapasztalatod IT üzemeltetésben, úgy érzed megállnád a helyed a kritikus rendszerek működtetésében, profin koordinálnád azokat, és biztos támogatója lennél a partnercégünk infrastruktúrájának, akkor jelentkezz IT infrastruktúra adminisztrátori pozíciónkba.
Partnerünk a minőségi utasélményt új szintre emeléséért dolgozik. Budapesti lokációjú csapatukba keresünk új kollégát. 
Feladatok:

Részvétel a kritikus rendszereket érintő hibaesemények megoldásában a „ITIL” alapú „Incident Management Process” folyamat alapján.

ÁLLÁSHIRDETÉS FELADÁS
Pozíció leírása / Job description
Our Client is one of the leading investment banks in the world, and for their growing professional team we are looking for an Identity & Access Management (IAM) Analyst 2 (Officer).
GIAM Operations is a part of the company's Global Identity & Access Management group, consisting of 700 employees, located across four service centers (CSCs) in Asia, Europe and North America including 11 in-country operations. The operations is organized to have dedicated teams supporting applications utilized by different business sectors as well as platforms like CyberArk, Database, Mainframe, Active Directory, etc. Under the umbrella of Chief Information Security Office (CISO). GIAM shares the mission to protect them from access management vulnerabilities and threats to key business systems.
At our client, they groom the leaders of today and tomorrow. Take the opportunity to embark on a challenging, fulfilling and rewarding career in cybersecurity at a global financial institution.
The identity and access management (IAM) analyst is responsible for fulfilling access requests within a variety of banking applications and infrastructure systems. The objective of the role is to manage user roles and access privileges within compliance of set information security policies and standards. The analyst is expected to:
Have a strong understanding of the global identity and access management (GIAM) - products, processes, resources and tools in their respective platform with an ability to review processes in accordance with the company's policies
Support Global Identity and Access Management (GIAM) operation including weekends and public holidays on a rotational basis, as well as assigned On-call emergency support
Handle complex requests and issues independently by having a good understanding of security administration processes, practices, and policies; escalate a severity issue to relevant parties and assist in resolution
Provide audit related deliverables in short turnaround time, participate in compliance and audit related meetings
Work with the team to ensure completion of Marketplace requests, troubleshooting incident issues, closure of compliance-related action items and tasks are done within operational and controls thresholds
Understand Continuity of Business and supports its application to GIAM processes by maintaining resources like process control document up-to-date, ISA accesses, etc. within applications in scope of support
Identify potential opportunities and raise to management's attention, as well as raise ideas to improve information security controls for supported systems
Maintain availability to customers, team members, escalation manager, and senior management and handle customer and team interactions in a manner that lives up to the company's leadership principles
Effectively utilize Talent Management process (i.e., goal setup, self-assessment, feedback, individual development plan etc.) to manage own performance and work on continuous development
Assist in the development of team members by providing coaching and training particularly to new team members or new team processes
Complete other tasks/activities/projects in connection with the organizations' goals not detailed in the current job description such as automation, migration, controls culture, etc.
Demonstrate particular consideration for the firm's reputation and safeguarding the company, its clients and assets, by complying with applicable laws, rules and regulations, adhering to policy, applying sound ethical judgment regarding personal behavior, conduct and business practices, and reporting control issues with transparency
                Elvárások / Requirements
Qualifications
Bachelor’s Degree/University degree of any course and minimum of 5+ years of experience in an Information Security role or related field with service delivery and customer relationship management
Interprets the principle of Information Security concepts and policies and ability to apply into day-to-day work
Demonstrate an understanding of the risk associated with cyber security and the controls set in place to manage risk in identity and access management
Proven use of discretion and sound judgment on handling of information with subject to sensitivity
Flexibility to work in various shift to provide On-call, holiday and/or weekend support on a periodic frequency
Proven capability to work within a team, seeks the input of others and greets change with optimism, curiosity and resilience, ability to manage multiple priorities and adjust to evolving work needs
Understand and relates own goals to the company, business' and teams', create SMART goals and demonstrate accountability to achieve them
Consistently demonstrate clear and concise written and verbal communication in the English language as well as sensitive to audience diversity
Strong analytical skills and ability to use Lean methodology to identify process improvements; utilize Microsoft applications to analyze and interpret data
CyberArk Experience
At least 5+ years of experience in IT production support environment, and hands on of experience in Information Security, Identity & Access Management (IAM) technologies and tools.
Minimum 5+ years of experience in Privileged Identity/Access Management and working knowledge on CyberArk.
Hands - on experience in troubleshooting and implementation of account in CyberArk onboarding with working knowledge of access control models across technologies.
Knowledge on testing connectors/platforms and other network devices. Application related knowledge on AIM WCS & ECS.
Expertise in CPM, PSM, PVWA and Private Ark for trouble shooting and fixing issues in production & UAT.
Should be a key player in terms of disaster recovery and mock drill testing.
AdvantagesRelevant experience in the following platforms may be preferred in some case(s):
For Databases: Oracle, MS SQL, Sybase, Teradata, MongoDB
For Enterprise Systems: IBM RACF, CA TopSecret, AS/400, Stratus, Tandem, Unisys, VMS systems
For Wintel: Active Directory, Wintel NAS servers
For Unix: Unix OS, LDAP
                Amit nyújtunk / Benefits

Private Medical Care Program and onsite medical rooms in our buildings
Pension Plan Contribution to Voluntary Pension Fund
Group Life Insurance
Flexible work arrangements
Continuous career progression opportunities across geographies and business line
An inclusive and friendly corporate culture with diverse networking opportunities
